title: Business : JS-SEZ Among Key Catalysts For Johor To Boost GDP To RM260 Bln By 2030
content: By Hasnah Jusid JOHOR BAHRU, Feb 28 (Bernama) -- Johorâ€™s target of achieving a gross domestic product (GDP) of RM260 billion by 2030 has been described as realistic, with the Johor-Singapore Special Economic Zone (JS-SEZ) expected to be one of the main drivers of the stateâ€™s economic growth. Associate Prof Dr Mohd Effandi Yusoff, a senior lecturer at Universiti Teknologi Malaysiaâ€™s Faculty of Management, said the target is achievable provided several critical economic factors are effectively implemented and managed over the next five years. â€œJohor is in a solid position to attract domestic and foreign investments. A peaceful and stable environment is also an important factor in building investor confidence and ensuring that development can be carried out sustainably and continuously,â€ he told Bernama when contacted. To date, Johor has shown encouraging performance, recording the countryâ€™s highest approved investments totalling RM91.1 billion in the first nine months of 2025 and hence surpassing Selangor (RM51.9 billion), Kuala Lumpur (RM45.9 billion) and Penang (RM23.7 billion). Mohd Effandi said one of the most important factors requiring attention is the ability to integrate economic operations between Johor and Singapore, citing the development model of Shenzhen and Hong Kong as an example. In the context of the JS-SEZ, he said, research and development (R&D), financial activities could be focused in Singapore, while Johor concentrates on high-value manufacturing, logistics and supply chain aspects. â€œThis model enables both regions to leverage their respective competitive advantages. If this integration is implemented strategically, Johor will directly benefit from the economic outcome,â€ he said. According to him, talent availability will be a key catalyst in supporting the transition to an innovation- and high technology-based economy. â€œJohor has several public and private higher education institutions capable of producing skilled manpower. In fact, universities outside Johor are also able to supply skilled and semi-skilled workers in line with rising industry needs,â€ he said. In terms of infrastructure, he noted that projects involving efficient transportation and cross-border facilities will accelerate the flow of capital, goods and labour. Mohd Effandi said the Rapid Transit System Link (RTS Link) between Johor Bahru and Singapore, digital customs clearance and the development of other supporting infrastructure will serve as key catalysts for...

title: IMD predicts rain in Northeast, Kerala; warns of rising temperatures
content: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) has predicted light to moderate rainfall with thunderstorms and lightning in several states. These include Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Meghalaya, and Kerala. The weather conditions are also likely to continue over sub-Himalayan West Bengal and Sikkim on March 1. The active weather pattern is expected to continue into early March. The IMD's weather bulletin has also forecast isolated light rainfall or snowfall in Jammu and Kashmir on March 3 and 4. This prediction comes as part of the department's extended weather forecast for the region. The IMD has also warned of rising temperatures in western India, predicting hot and humid conditions in isolated pockets of Gujarat on March 4 and 5. In Delhi, the IMD has predicted mainly clear weather during the day with mist in the early morning hours. The temperature in the national capital is expected to reach 30Â°C to 32Â°C during the day and drop to between 13Â°C and 15Â°C at night. This forecast is part of a larger warming trend expected across much of India over the coming week. The IMD has warned of a gradual rise in maximum temperatures by 2Â°C to 5Â°C over the plains of Northwest India during the next week. This is likely to push maximum temperatures up to 3-5Â°C above normal in many parts of Northwest India during the week. Central India is also expected to see a gradual increase in maximum temperatures by 2-4Â°C over six days. East India is likely to see a 2-3Â°C rise in maximum temperatures over the next three days. However, no major changes are expected thereafter. In Maharashtra, maximum temperatures are likely to rise by 3-4Â°C over four days with no significant change thereafter. Meanwhile, Gujarat's maximum temperatures are likely to rise gradually by 3-5Â°C during the next five days without any major change in the next 24 hours.

title: Motorola saÌ†Ìp ra maÌ†Ìt smartphone moÌ›Ìi Ä‘aÌ‚Ì€y baÌ‚Ìt ngoÌ›Ì€

Tuy nhieÌ‚n, coÌ‚ng ty duÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng nhuÌ› Ä‘ang aÌ‚Ì‰n giaÌ‚Ìu moÌ£Ì‚t baÌ‚Ìt ngoÌ›Ì€ khoÌ‚ng nhoÌ‰ cho nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i tieÌ‚u duÌ€ng taÌ£i suÌ›Ì£ kieÌ£Ì‚n saÌ†Ìp toÌ›Ìi baÌ†Ì€ng vieÌ£Ì‚c gioÌ›Ìi thieÌ£Ì‚u maÌ‚Ìƒu smartphone Ä‘aÌ‚Ì€y haÌ‚Ìp daÌ‚Ìƒn coÌ teÌ‚n Edge 70 Fusion Plus. Motorola Edge 70 Fusion troÌ‚ng raÌ‚Ìt Ä‘eÌ£p voÌ›Ìi maÌ€u Pantone Blue Surf AÌ‰NH: MOTOROLA CaÌc roÌ€ riÌ‰ moÌ›Ìi nhaÌ‚Ìt tuÌ›Ì€ YTECHB.com cho bieÌ‚Ìt, Edge 70 Fusion Plus seÌƒ mang Ä‘eÌ‚Ìn moÌ£Ì‚t soÌ‚Ì caÌ‰i tieÌ‚Ìn Ä‘aÌng keÌ‚Ì‰ so voÌ›Ìi maÌ‚Ìƒu Edge 70 Fusion. CaÌ‰ hai phieÌ‚n baÌ‰n cuÌ‰a doÌ€ng Edge 70 Fusion Ä‘eÌ‚Ì€u coÌ thieÌ‚Ìt keÌ‚Ì maÌ£Ì†t luÌ›ng laÌ‚Ìy caÌ‰m huÌ›Ìng tuÌ›Ì€ chaÌ‚Ìt lieÌ£Ì‚u nylon vaÌ€ vaÌ‰i lanh, maÌ€n hiÌ€nh 6,78 inch voÌ›Ìi kiÌnh cuÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng luÌ›Ì£c Corning Gorilla Glass 7i, cuÌ€ng khaÌ‰ naÌ†ng choÌ‚Ìng buÌ£i vaÌ€ nuÌ›oÌ›Ìc Ä‘aÌ£t chuaÌ‚Ì‰n IP68 vaÌ€ IP69. Motorola seÌƒ mang Ä‘eÌ‚Ìn khaÌc bieÌ£Ì‚t naÌ€o cho Edge 70 Fusion Plus? ÄieÌ‚Ì‰m noÌ‚Ì‰i baÌ£Ì‚t nhaÌ‚Ìt giuÌ›Ìƒa hai maÌ‚Ìƒu maÌy naÌ†Ì€m oÌ›Ì‰ camera. Edge 70 Fusion Plus seÌƒ trang biÌ£ camera chiÌnh 50 MP, trong khi camera selfie vaÌ€ camera sieÌ‚u roÌ£Ì‚ng Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c naÌ‚ng tuÌ›Ì€ 32 MP leÌ‚n 50 MP vaÌ€ tuÌ›Ì€ 13 MP leÌ‚n 50 MP tuÌ›oÌ›ng uÌ›Ìng. ThoÌ‚ng tin roÌ€ riÌ‰ hieÌ£Ì‚n taÌ£i chuÌ›a xaÌc nhaÌ£Ì‚n lieÌ£Ì‚u caÌc thoÌ‚ng soÌ‚Ì kyÌƒ thuaÌ£Ì‚t khaÌc coÌ gioÌ‚Ìng nhau hay khoÌ‚ng. title: Google Ä‘uÌ›a moÌ£Ì‚t tiÌnh naÌ†ng coÌ‚Ìt loÌƒi cuÌ‰a Gemini cho nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i duÌ€ng mieÌ‚Ìƒn phiÌ
content: Chatbot AI cuÌ‰a Google thuÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng gaÌ£Ì†p khoÌ khaÌ†n trong vieÌ£Ì‚c ghi nhoÌ›Ì thoÌ‚ng tin, Ä‘aÌ£Ì†c bieÌ£Ì‚t Ä‘oÌ‚Ìi voÌ›Ìi nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i duÌ€ng mieÌ‚Ìƒn phiÌ. Tuy nhieÌ‚n, baÌ‰n caÌ£Ì‚p nhaÌ£Ì‚t moÌ›Ìi nhaÌ‚Ìt daÌ€nh cho Gemini coÌ theÌ‚Ì‰ khaÌ†Ìc phuÌ£c phaÌ‚Ì€n naÌ€o vaÌ‚Ìn Ä‘eÌ‚Ì€ naÌ€y. Theo PhoneArena , tiÌnh naÌ†ng "CaÌc cuoÌ£Ì‚c troÌ€ chuyeÌ£Ì‚n truÌ›oÌ›Ìc Ä‘aÌ‚y" cuÌ‰a Gemini seÌƒ soÌ›Ìm Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c trieÌ‚Ì‰n khai cho nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i duÌ€ng mieÌ‚Ìƒn phiÌ, aÌp duÌ£ng treÌ‚n caÌ‰ uÌ›Ìng duÌ£ng di Ä‘oÌ£Ì‚ng vaÌ€ phieÌ‚n baÌ‰n web cuÌ‰a chatbot. NhuÌ› teÌ‚n goÌ£i, "CaÌc cuoÌ£Ì‚c troÌ€ chuyeÌ£Ì‚n truÌ›oÌ›Ìc Ä‘aÌ‚y" cho pheÌp Gemini ghi nhoÌ›Ì caÌc cuoÌ£Ì‚c troÌ€ chuyeÌ£Ì‚n truÌ›oÌ›Ìc, tuÌ›Ì€ Ä‘oÌ giuÌp AI hieÌ‚Ì‰u roÌƒ hoÌ›n veÌ‚Ì€ soÌ›Ì‰ thiÌch cuÌ‰a nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i duÌ€ng vaÌ€ Ä‘uÌ›a ra caÌc caÌ‚u traÌ‰ loÌ›Ì€i caÌ nhaÌ‚n hoÌa maÌ€ khoÌ‚ng caÌ‚Ì€n phaÌ‰i nhaÌ†Ìc laÌ£i thoÌ‚ng tin. TiÌnh naÌ†ng moÌ›Ìi xuaÌ‚Ìt hieÌ£Ì‚n trong phaÌ‚Ì€n caÌ€i Ä‘aÌ£Ì†t cuÌ‰a Gemini AÌ‰NH: 9TO5GOOGLE ChaÌ†Ì‰ng haÌ£n, khi nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i duÌ€ng tieÌ‚Ìp tuÌ£c thaÌ‰o luaÌ£Ì‚n veÌ‚Ì€ moÌ£Ì‚t chuÌ‰ Ä‘eÌ‚Ì€ trong cuoÌ£Ì‚c troÌ€ chuyeÌ£Ì‚n moÌ›Ìi, hoÌ£ khoÌ‚ng caÌ‚Ì€n phaÌ‰i laÌ€m roÌƒ miÌ€nh Ä‘aÌƒ nghieÌ‚n cuÌ›Ìu Ä‘eÌ‚Ìn Ä‘aÌ‚u. NguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i duÌ€ng cuÌƒng coÌ theÌ‚Ì‰ hoÌ‰i Gemini lieÌ£Ì‚u noÌ coÌ suÌ›Ì‰ duÌ£ng thoÌ‚ng tin tuÌ›Ì€ caÌc cuoÌ£Ì‚c troÌ€ chuyeÌ£Ì‚n truÌ›oÌ›Ìc khoÌ‚ng. KhoÌ‚ng phaÌ‰i moÌ£i khu vuÌ›Ì£c Ä‘eÌ‚Ì€u coÌ tiÌnh naÌ†ng moÌ›Ìi cuÌ‰a Gemini Tuy nhieÌ‚n, Ä‘aÌ‚y laÌ€ tiÌnh naÌ†ng hieÌ£Ì‚n chiÌ‰ moÌ›Ìi Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c trieÌ‚Ì‰n khai cho haÌ‚Ì€u heÌ‚Ìt nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i duÌ€ng treÌ‚n toaÌ€n caÌ‚Ì€u, ngoaÌ£i truÌ›Ì€ nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i duÌ€ng oÌ›Ì‰ ChaÌ‚u AÌ‚u, noÌ›i tiÌnh naÌ†ng seÌƒ Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c ra maÌ†Ìt muoÌ£Ì‚n hoÌ›n do caÌc quy Ä‘iÌ£nh nghieÌ‚m ngaÌ£Ì†t veÌ‚Ì€ baÌ‰o veÌ£Ì‚ duÌ›Ìƒ lieÌ£Ì‚u caÌ nhaÌ‚n. Trong tuÌ›oÌ›ng lai, tiÌnh naÌ†ng naÌ€y coÌ theÌ‚Ì‰ Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c keÌ‚Ìt noÌ‚Ìi voÌ›Ìi caÌc saÌ‰n phaÌ‚Ì‰m khaÌc cuÌ‰a Google nhuÌ› Gmail vaÌ€ Photos nhaÌ†Ì€m naÌ‚ng cao khaÌ‰ naÌ†ng ghi nhoÌ›Ì. CaÌc chatbot AI khaÌc nhuÌ› ChatGPT cuÌƒng Ä‘aÌƒ trieÌ‚Ì‰n khai tiÌnh naÌ†ng tuÌ›oÌ›ng tuÌ›Ì£ nhaÌ†Ì€m cho pheÌp nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i duÌ€ng truy caÌ£Ì‚p vaÌ€o caÌc cuoÌ£Ì‚c troÌ€ chuyeÌ£Ì‚n gaÌ‚Ì€n Ä‘aÌ‚y. title: Ranabaali: Makers drop surprise video as Rashmika, Vijayâ€™s first look goes viral
content: The makers of the much-anticipated Telugu film Ranabaali have released an exciting first look of its leading stars, Rashmika Mandanna and Vijay Deverakonda, along with a special surprise video that has further raised expectations for the project. The announcement has ignited enthusiasm among audiences eager to see the real-life couple share the screen in this period action drama.Rashmika Mandanna and Vijay Deverakonda reunite with RanabaaliRanabaali marks one of the most talked-about collaborations in Telugu cinema, pairing two of the industryâ€™s biggest names in a project that promises spectacle, emotion and intense drama. The first look gives a glimpse of the filmâ€™s world, which is set against the backdrop of a historical era filled with conflict, rebellion and larger-than-life storytelling. Visuals from the reveal show both Rashmika and Vijay in commanding and evocative avatars, hinting at the dramatic depth and scale that the film aims to achieve.Alongside the first look, the makers also dropped a specially created video that teases the tone and atmosphere of the movie. Although the full narrative remains under wraps, the teaser has already sparked discussion and excitement on social media platforms, with fans lauding the striking visuals and strong presence of the lead pair.Ranabaali`s first look leaves fans mesmerizedThe buzz surrounding the film is amplified by the fact that Rashmika and Vijay recently made headlines with their much-celebrated wedding, making this on-screen reunion particularly meaningful for fans who have followed their personal journey as well as their careers. The coupleâ€™s real-life chemistry is expected to translate into compelling performances, drawing audiences into their charactersâ€™ emotional arcs in Ranabaali.Our RANABAALI and JAYAMMA âœ¨Together, forever â¤ï¸Celebrating their love with this special surprise ğŸ«¶â–¶ï¸ https://t.co/ZZTcMpUNOA#EndhayyaSaami â€“ Telugu#YedhayyaSaami â€“ Tamil#EntheKannaala â€“ Malayalam#EnayyaSaami - Kannada#OMereSaajan - Hindi#Ranabaali Grand release... pic.twitter.com/QtSr0ydBKVâ€” Mythri Movie Makers (@MythriOfficial) February 28, 2026The film is directed by Rahul Sankrityan and produced by Mythri Movie Makers, known for backing ambitious and high-production-value films that appeal to a pan-Indian audience. The music is composed by the acclaimed duo Ajay-Atul, adding further anticipation for the filmâ€™s musical elements which are expected to enhance its dramatic and emotional impact.With its visually rich...

title: US launches wave of military strikes on Iran from aircraft carriers, bases in region
content: The United States launched a new wave of military strikes on Iran on Saturday, in a joint US-Israeli operation against Tehran, the New York Times reported. Explosions were also reported in several Iranian cities as the strikes unfolded, according to the New York Times, which cited Iran's semiofficial Fars News Agency.US officials told the New York Times that dozens of strikes are being carried out by attack aircraft flying from US bases around the Middle East and from one or more aircraft carriers. The New York Times reported that US officials expect the current attack to be far more extensive than the American strikes last June against Iranian nuclear facilities.The escalation comes after what the New York Times described as a massive US military buildup in the region, including two aircraft carriers, a number of naval destroyers, and more than 50 fighter planes. The New York Times framed the deployments as laying the groundwork for sustained operations and signaling readiness to widen the campaign if diplomacy failed.In the political track, the New York Times reported that US President Donald Trump grew increasingly frustrated with negotiations over Iran's nuclear program, despite having campaigned against interventionism and casting himself as a peacemaker. The New York Times said Trump's envoys, Steve Witkoff and Jared Kushner, met with Iranian officials in Geneva on Thursday, but the president said on Friday he was â€œnot happyâ€ with the talks, adding that he would â€œlove not to use force,â€ while acknowledging that â€œsometimes you have to.â€The New York Times placed the latest strikes in the context of last year's June attacks, when US forces bombed three Iranian nuclear facilities during Israel's 12-day war with Tehran, directly involving the United States in combat operations. Those June strikes came after Trump lost patience with diplomacy and shifted his position under Israeli pressure, the New York Times reported, and the current operation is expected by US officials to go beyond that earlier action in scale.On Capitol Hill, the New York Times reported that Rep. Thomas Massie (R-Kentucky) said lawmakers intended to hold votes next week to prohibit the president from authorizing strikes without consulting Congress, though the issue may now be seen by many as overtaken by events given US military action already underway.This is a developing story.

UÌˆreticilerin sorularÄ±nÄ± da yanÄ±tladÄ±klarÄ±nÄ± aktaran KoÌˆse, toplantÄ±larda uÌˆretim planlamasÄ±, tarÄ±msal desteklemeler, CÌ§iftcÌ§i KayÄ±t Sistemi (CÌ§KS) isÌ§ ve isÌ§lemleri, genel tarÄ±m sayÄ±mÄ±, hayvan ve bitki sagÌ†lÄ±gÌ†Ä±, TarÄ±m SigortalarÄ± (TARSIÌ‡M) ve B-RecÌ§ete hakkÄ±nda bilgi verdiklerini kaydetti.

title: TESK'ten TarÄ±msal UÌˆretim ve Enflasyon Vurgusu
content: TarÄ±msal uÌˆruÌˆnler, et, bakliyat, meyve ve sebze olmak uÌˆzere gÄ±da uÌˆruÌˆnlerindeki enflasyonu duÌˆsÌ§uÌˆrmek icÌ§in uÌˆretimin desteklenmesi gerektigÌ†ini soÌˆyleyen TuÌˆrkiye Esnaf ve SanatkarlarÄ± Konfederasyonu (TESK) Genel BasÌ§kanÄ± Bendevi PalandoÌˆken , "TarÄ±msal analiz yapÄ±lÄ±p boÌˆlge haritalarÄ± cÌ§Ä±karÄ±lmalÄ±" dedi. "ARACILARIN VE FIÌ‡YAT ARTIRANLARIN OÌˆNUÌˆNE GECÌ§IÌ‡LMESIÌ‡ LAZIM" Tarladan sofraya gelinceye kadar en oÌˆnemli unsurun lojistik destegÌ†i oldugÌ†unu belirten PalandoÌˆken, "Lojistik destekleri yaptÄ±gÌ†Ä±nÄ±z zaman, uÌˆretim merkezinden, nihai tuÌˆketim merkezine veya sofranÄ±za gelinceye kadarki aracÄ±larÄ±n fiyat artÄ±ranlarÄ±n oÌˆnuÌˆne gecÌ§ilmesi lazÄ±m. Yani tasÌ§Ä±madaki zayiat yoÌˆnuÌˆnden uÌˆruÌˆnuÌˆn muhafazasÄ±nÄ±n zorlugÌ†u, aracÌ§larÄ±n donanÄ±mlÄ± olmamasÄ±ndan kaynaklanan maliyetlerin artmasÄ±. Bireysel isÌ§letmelerde cÌ§iftcÌ§iye verilecek destekler, guÌˆbreler vs. oÌˆzendirici olmalÄ±. Bu bilincÌ§ yerlesÌ§medigÌ†i suÌˆrece de muÌˆcadele etmek cÌ§ok zor. title: BIG CATASTROPHE IN LATIN AMERICA: Military Plane CRASHES On Highway, Chaos Erupts; 'SEVERAL DEAD...'
content: At least 15 people were killed and dozens injured after a Bolivian military transport plane crashed near El Alto International Airport in El Alto, Bolivia. The Bolivian Air Force Lockheed Martin C-130 Hercules transport aircraft reportedly lost control while attempting to land in poor weather, skidding off the runway before crashing into vehicles on a busy road. Officials said the plane had departed from Santa Cruz carrying newly printed banknotes when it crashed, triggering chaos at the scene as crowds rushed to collect scattered bills before police intervened. Flights were temporarily suspended as emergency crews secured the area.

title: ViiV Healthcare presents data for two investigational HIV treatment therapies with potential for twiceâ”€yearly dosing
content: ViiV Healthcare, the global specialist HIV company majority owned by GSK, with Pfizer and Shionogi as shareholders, has announced data from its phase 1 study of long-acting formulations of VH184, the first, third-generation integrase strand transfer inhibitor (INSTI) in development for HIV. Results show a single-dose injection could maintain drug levels for up to six months. In-vitro data from a separate study demonstrate improved potency and an enhanced resistance profile versus bictegravir in resistant HIV strains. Additional data from ViiV Healthcareâ€™s long-acting pipeline presented at the 33rd Conference on Retroviruses and Opportunistic Infections (CROI 2026) in Denver, Colorado, show VH499, an investigational capsid inhibitor, was generally well tolerated and support the potential for ultra long-acting (ULA) twice-yearly dosing. These early-stage findings, alongside continued progress of other ULA pipeline assets, including lotivibart (N6LS), reinforce ViiV Healthcareâ€™s commitment to advancing innovative long-acting HIV therapies that reduce the need for daily treatment and expand options for people living with HIV. Kimberly Smith, head of research & development at ViiV Healthcare, said: â€œOur R&D efforts are built around delivering best-in-class, long-acting therapies that challenge the status quo and help make HIV treatment a smaller, less frequent part of peopleâ€™s lives. The data weâ€™re presenting on VH184, our third-generation INSTI, indicate a potential high barrier to resistance and twice-yearly dosing intervals. Early results for VH499, a capsid inhibitor, point to its potential for dosing every six months. These data underscore how ViiV Healthcare is working to define the future of HIV care through ultra long-acting options designed to address the needs and preferences of people living with HIV and will inform our plans to introduce the first INSTI-based, twice-yearly regimen for people with HIV.â€ VH184 shows potential for dosing intervals of up to twice-yearly and improved activity versus bictegravir.1,2 In a phase 1 study of long-acting formulations in adults without HIV, VH184 was given as a single subcutaneous (SC) or intramuscular (IM) injection in one of two formulations. Both formulations demonstrated long-acting properties, with one maintaining steady drug levels through Month 7, indicating the potential for twice-yearly dosing. The VH184 formulations were generally well tolerated, with most side effects limited to mild grade 1...

title: Fenomena 'bulan berdarah' pada Selasa ini
content: KUALA LUMPUR: Orang ramai akan melihat fenomena 'bulan berdarah' berikutan gerhana bulan penuh pada Selasa depan.Agensi Angkasa Malaysia (MYSA) berkata fenomena itu hanya berlaku sekali tahun ini dan gerhana bulan seterusnya adalah pada 31 Disember 2028."Gerhana bulan fasa separa (U1) bermula pada jam 5.50 petang dan seterusnya memasuki fasa penuh (U2) pada 7.04 petang dengan kemuncak gerhana (GE) pada 7.33 petang. "Fasa penuh akan tamat pada 8.02 malam dan memasuki fasa separa (U3) kembali sehingga jam 9 malam," katanya dalam kenyataan di laman Facebook, hari ini.Gerhana bulan apabila bumi berada di antara matahari dan bulan sehingga bayang-bayang bumi menutupi keseluruhan permukaan bulan menyebabkan bulan kelihatan kemerahan.MYSA berkata, tempoh keseluruhan gerhana mengambil masa kira-kira 5 jam 39 minit, manakala fasa penuh berlangsung hampir 58 minit."Bagi kebanyakan negeri di Semenanjung, bulan akan terbit dalam fasa penuh dan berkemungkinan sukar dilihat dengan keadaan langit senja yang masih agak terang. "Bagi Kuala Lumpur, ketinggian bulan akan berada pada dua darjah dari ufuk Timur pada ketika kemuncak gerhana. "Sabah dan Sarawak mempunyai peluang lebih tinggi untuk mencerap fenomena gerhana ini kerana bulan terbit lebih awal maka ia berada pada sudut lebih tinggi," katanya.Katanya, fenomena gerhana penuh kali ini boleh disaksikan di Asia Timur, Australia, Lautan Pasifik, Amerika Utara dan Amerika Tengah. "Di Asia Tengah dan sebahagian besar Amerika Selatan, hanya terjadi Gerhana Bulan Separa."Gerhana bulan boleh dilihat dengan mata kasar (bergantung kepada keadaan cuaca). Bagaimanapun, penggunaan binokular atau teleskop akan membantu untuk melihat fenomena ini dengan lebih jelas," katanya.Â© New Straits Times Press (M) Bhd
creator: farah marshita abdul patah

title: The Latest: Israel launches attack on Iran's capital
content: The United States and Israel launched an attack Saturday on Iran, with the first apparent strike happening near the offices of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. Iranian media reported strikes nationwide, and smoke could be seen rising from the capital. President Donald Trump said in a video posted on social media that the U.S. had begun â€œmajor combat operations in Iran.â€ He claimed Iran has continued to develop its nuclear program and plans to develop missiles to reach U.S. Here's the latest: Sirens and blasts reported in Kuwait Witnesses heard sirens and explosions in Kuwait, home to U.S. Army Central. There was no immediate word on any damage. US and Israeli strikes suggest wider campaign, Dutch analyst says Strikes in Iran by Israel and the U.S. suggests â€œshaping actionsâ€ designed to degrade air defenses in a pattern typical of a wider military campaign, a Dutch intelligence firm said. â€œThe broader pattern suggests preparatory shaping actions,â€ said Eric Schouten, CEO of Dyami security intelligence firm in the Netherlands. â€œThis appears less like a symbolic strike and more like the opening phase of a coordinated campaign designed to establish air superiority and operational freedom of movement. â€œNeutralizing radar systems, surface-to-air missile batteries, and command nodes would create more permissive conditions for sustained air operations over Iranian territory.â€ Streets in Israel empty as sirens wail In Israel, the public was instructed to stay close to shelters. Streets were mostly empty as a series of sirens continued to sound for most of Saturday morning. Israelâ€™s main news programs shifted their broadcasts to bomb shelters as well. US 5th Fleet service center was attacked, Bahrain says Bahrainâ€™s state news agency says the service center of the U.S. 5th Fleet was subjected to a missile attack. The agency said it will give further details later. Israel says operation was planned for months Israel said the attack on Iran was carried out as a â€œbroad, coordinated, and joint operation against the regimeâ€ that has been planned for months between the Israeli and U.S. militaries. Explosions heard in skies over Syria and Lebanon Associated Press journalists in Damascus and in the city of Sidon in southern Lebanon heard sounds of explosions Saturday, apparently as a result of Israeli air defenses intercepting Iranian missiles. US embassies in Middle East advise Americans to take cover U.S. embassies or consulates in Qatar, the United Arab Emirates...

title: Israel launches "preemptive" strike against Iran
content: This photo taken on Feb. 28, 2026 shows a view of downtown Teheran, Iran. Israel launched a "preemptive" strike against Iran on Saturday morning "to remove threats to Israel," the Israeli Defense Ministry said in a statement. (Xinhua/Shadati) JERUSALEM/TEHRAN, Feb. 28 (Xinhua) -- Israel launched a "preemptive" strike against Iran on Saturday morning "to remove threats to Israel," the Israeli Defense Ministry said in a statement. Apparent strikes in Tehran happened near offices of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, according to media reports. Multiple missiles also hit University Street, Jomhouri area and elsewhere in Tehran. Iran closed its airspace while the attack was ongoing. Meanwhile, sirens were sounded across Israel to warn the public to prepare for the possibility of Iranian retaliation. Israeli airspace is closed to civilian flights, according to Israeli airports authority. The attack from Israel, which reportedly was coordinated with the United States, came after the U.S.-Iran nuclear talks concluded in Geneva on Thursday. Tensions between the United States and Iran were soaring amid massive U.S. military buildup in the Middle East and the stalled nuclear talks. â–  People leave a cafe after a siren is sounded in Jerusalem on Feb. 28, 2026. Israel launched a "preemptive" strike against Iran on Saturday morning "to remove threats to Israel," the Israeli Defense Ministry said in a statement. Sirens were sounded across Israel to warn the public to prepare for the possibility of an Iranian missile attack on Israel. (Xinhua/Chen Junqing) People walk on a street after a siren is sounded in Jerusalem on Feb. 28, 2026. Israel launched a "preemptive" strike against Iran on Saturday morning "to remove threats to Israel," the Israeli Defense Ministry said in a statement. Sirens were sounded across Israel to warn the public to prepare for the possibility of an Iranian missile attack on Israel. (Xinhua/Chen Junqing)

title: Sri Lanka construction PMI rises to 75 in January
content: COLOMBO, Feb. 28 (Xinhua) -- Sri Lanka's construction sector expanded sharply in January 2026, with the Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) for Construction, as reflected by the Total Activity Index, rising from 67.1 in December to 75.0, the second-highest reading recorded, according to data released by the Central Bank of Sri Lanka on Friday. The increase in the Total Activity Index indicated a higher rate of growth month on month. The January figure was second only to the peak of 75.7 recorded in July 2020. Most firms reported higher project activity during the month, supported by the commencement of new projects at the start of the year and the easing of weather-related disruptions experienced in December. The New Orders Index rose from 67.6 in December to 77.8 in January, due to increased project availability across most construction segments. The Employment Index also expanded, rising from 50.0 to 54.2, indicating growth from a neutral position. However, many firms reported ongoing difficulties in recruiting employees for various skilled occupational categories. Construction activities are expected to remain upbeat over the next three months, supported by anticipated project commencements. â–

title: Kerala Imamâ€™s call to open mosques for Attukal Pongala devotees
content: The appeal of Palayam Imam VP Suhaib Maulavi to open mosques and Muslim houses to Hindu devotees on the upcoming Attukal Pongala festival day here has gone viral on social media platforms, with many netizens describing it as the example of the real Kerala story. Attukal Pongala, which falls on March 3 this year, is considered one of the largest women gatherings in the world, in which lakhs of women, cutting across ages, gather in the capital city to take part in the festivities. Maulavi, during his Friday sermon, urged the members of the Muslim community to extend hospitality to Hindu devotees arriving in the city for the Pongala festival. In his address, he said that although Attukal Pongala is associated with a different faith and Muslims do not take part in its rituals and ceremonies, the occasion presents an opportunity to serve as gracious hosts to the thousands of women and children who visit Thiruvananthapuram as guests.
creator: news and media

title: Nine cheetahs from Botswana arrive at Kuno National Park
content: Nine more cheetahs from Botswana landed safely at Kuno National Park (KNP) on Saturday, taking Indiaâ€™s total count of the big cats to 48, an official said. The third batch of cheetahs from Africa arrived on IAF aircraft as part of a four-year population revival plan, the official said. Union Environment, Forest and Climate Change Minister Bhupender Yadav will release the big cats into enclosures readied at the park, he said. The new batch from Botswana was flown in to Gwalior on an Indian Air Force aircraft, and from there, IAF choppers transported them to KNP, Sheopur public relations officer Avantika Shrivastava told reporters.
creator: news and media

title: DMK And Congress begin formal seat-sharing talks
content: The ruling DMK and its major ally the Congress on Saturday began the formal seat-sharing talks for the upcoming Assembly election. The Congress delegation under AICC incharge for Tamil Nadu Girish Chodankar, TNCC chief K Selvaperunthagai and AICC co-incharge Niveditha Alva arrived at the Anna Arivalayam, the DMK state headquarters and commenced the talks with the DMK panel led by senior Parliamentarian T R Baalu. â€œLets not speculate. We will get back to you with details,â€ Chodankar earlier told reporters when asked about the number of seats the grand old party would demand from the DMK and whether a Rajya Sabha seat has been promised to the Congress.
creator: news and media

title: Woman constable found dead at home in Vikarabad
content: A woman constable working in Vikarabad district allegedly died by suicide at her house on Friday night. The constable B Divya, was working at the Circle Inspectorâ€™s Office in Dharur and staying at Saibaba colony in the district. On Saturday morning, she was found hanging from the ceiling fan in the house by her relatives. Upon receiving information, the police team reached the spot and shifted the body to the local government hospital mortuary. A case has been registered and police are trying to ascertain the cause.
creator: news and media

title: Air India suspends Tel Aviv flights as Israel launches airstrikes on Iran
content: Israel has declared â€œan immediate state of emergency across the countryâ€ as it launched a preemptive attack on Iran, Israeli defence minister Israel Katz said on Friday. Sirens blared across the country as Israel launched airstrike attacks. â€œThe State of Israel has launched a preemptive strike against Iran to remove threats to the State of Israel,â€ Katz said. The Israel Defence Forces (IDF) Home front command warned civilians to stay close to bomb shelters as sirens sounded across the country.
creator: news and media

title: Israel launches attack on Iranâ€™s capital with United States Help
content: Israel launched a daylight attack Saturday on Iranâ€™s capital, with a cloud of smoke rising from the cityâ€™s downtown. The first apparent strike happened near the offices of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. The United States is participating, though it was immediately clear the full extent of its involvement, according to a US official and a person familiar with the operation, who spoke on condition of anonymity to detail sensitive military operations. It wasnâ€™t immediately clear whether the 86-year-old Khamenei had been in his offices at the time. He hasnâ€™t been seen publicly in days as tensions with the United States have grown. But the attack comes as the United States has assembled a vast fleet of fighter jets and warships in the region to try to pressure Iran into a deal over its nuclear programme.
creator: news and media

title: Mancherial police book case over circulation of fake Rs 500 notes
content: A case was registered against unidentified persons for circulating fake currency notes in Luxettipet town on Friday. Police said a case was booked after detection of counterfeit currency notes at different commercial establishments in the town, and investigations were taken up. It is learnt that the police detained three persons from Itikyala village for their suspected role in circulating counterfeit currency notes. Further details are awaited.
creator: news and media

title: Kenyon Sadiq sets 40-yard dash record at NFL Scouting Combine, eyes first round
content: Kenyon Sadiq delivered one of the most impressive performances at the 2026 NFL Scouting Combine, strengthening his case as a potential first-round pick. The former Oregon Ducks tight end set a combine record by running the 40-yard dash in 4.39 seconds at Lucas Oil Stadium in Indianapolis. The previous tight end record of 4.40 was held by Vernon Davis. The next fastest tight end time this year was 4.51, posted by SMUâ€™s RJ Maryland and Vanderbiltâ€™s Eli Stowers. Sadiqâ€™s 43.5-inch vertical ranked second behind Stowers, who recorded 45.5 inches. In the broad jump, Sadiq posted 11 feet 1 inch, again finishing just behind Stowers at 11-3. Oregon safety Dillon Thieneman also stood out. His 4.35 40-yard dash ranked fourth among safeties, while his 41-inch vertical jump was second best at his position. He added a 10-5 broad jump, which ranked eighth. Thieneman entered the combine as a projected late first-round pick. After his strong testing numbers, he may have secured a spot in the opening round.

title: Bantwal: Loretto Central School celebrates National Science Day
content: Media Release Bantwal, Feb 28: Loretto Central School celebrated National Science Day, commemorating the discovery of the Raman Effect by the eminent Indian scientist C V Raman. The celebration was held in the school auditorium with great enthusiasm. The event was graced by the presence of manager Fr Francis Crasta, chief guest Roshan Pinto, science teacher Carmel Highschool Modankap, principal Fr Jason Vijay Monis, PTA vice president Rodney Ivan Dâ€™Souza, and vice principal Anitha Pais. The programme began with a prayer song by the school choir. The dignitaries inaugurated the programme by conducting a simple science experiment in which baking soda placed inside a balloon was allowed to mix with coloured vinegar in a bottle, producing a reaction that inflated the balloon and symbolised the spirit of curiosity and discovery. The chief guest Roshan Pinto, in his address, encouraged students to take C V Raman as a role model. He emphasised that curiosity should increase as we grow older and not decrease. He explained that success requires patience, repeated experimentation, and years of dedication, just as Raman worked for many years before achieving success. He motivated students to dream big and remain committed to their goals. He demonstrated experiments using pipes and balloons, showing how different lengths of pipes produce different sounds. Principal Fr Jason Vijay Monis advised students not to waste valuable time on social media. Instead, he encouraged them to use that time productively by gaining knowledge, developing interests, and implementing innovative ideas. He urged students to focus on meaningful learning and creative thinking. Manager Fr Francis Crasta highlighted that amazement, wonder, curiosity and innovation truly define the spirit of Science Day. He encouraged students to observe the world around them with interest, develop a questioning mindset, and nurture a curious and innovative attitude. On account of National Science Day, a science model making competition was conducted. Students actively participated and showcased their creativity and scientific understanding through innovative models. The winners were awarded and appreciated for their outstanding efforts. Vaagmi of grade 4 compered the programme. Shyna of grade 7 delivered the welcome address, and Praina explained the importance of National Science Day and the significance of the Raman Effect. The programme concluded with the vote of thanks proposed by Jewel Maria of grade 7.

title: Common lab design inflates 2D transistor performance by up to six times
content: Feb 28, 2026 Common lab design inflates 2D transistor performance by up to six times Lab architecture used to test 2D semiconductors artificially boosts performance metrics, making it harder to assess whether these materials can truly replace silicon. ( Nanowerk News ) Two-dimensional semiconductors could one day replace silicon in transistors, delivering smaller, faster and more energy-efficient processors. To ease their production and testing process, much of the field has been benchmarking the potential of 2D semiconductors using an architecture that causes a phenomenon called â€œcontact gating.â€ Now, findings from electrical engineers at Duke University suggest that this approach inflates how these transistors perform on paper and cannot be translated into commercial technologies. The research appeared in ACS Nano ( "Impact of Contact Gating on Scaling of Monolayer 2D Transistors Using a Symmetric Dual-Gate Structure" ) from the lab of Aaron Franklin, the Edmund T. Pratt, Jr. Distinguished Professor of Electrical and Computer Engineering (ECE). The symmetric dual-gate transistor built by Ravel allowed her to compare results with and without contact gating. (Image: Duke University) â€œMost reports of high-performance 2D transistors use a device design that isnâ€™t compatible with commercial technologies,â€ Franklin said. â€œWhat we show is that this design changes how the transistor operates in a way that can significantly inflate performance. If you donâ€™t account for that, it becomes very difficult to fairly evaluate how these materials will behave in a future transistor technology.â€ Transistors are the fundamental building blocks of all computers. They rapidly turn electrical currents on and off to form the 1s and 0s used in all programming languages. To improve processing performance, transistors must be made smaller, faster, more efficientâ€”or all three. Silicon has long been the semiconductor of choice to make transistors, but modern technology is pushing the materialâ€™s intrinsic limitations. Already, components found within transistors are as thin as physics will allow. To push beyond these limits, researchers are exploring different materials that can still work even if only one or two atoms thickâ€”so-called 2D materials. To study those materialsâ€™ performance, researchers often rely on a simple â€œbackâ€gatedâ€ architecture that builds all the transistorâ€™s components on a single piece of silicon to make fabrication easier and allow rapid experimentation. 8 months' jail for S'porean private-hire driver, 46, who ran red light killed M'sian motorcyclist, 38
content: A 46-year-old Singaporean private-hire driver was sentenced to eight months' jail after she hit and killed a 38-year-old Malaysian man on a motorcycle when she ran a red light in Eunos in 2024. The Straits Times reported that she was sentenced in court on Feb. 27, 2026. Pleaded guilty Bok Chuan Yue pleaded guilty to one count of driving without due care and attention thereby causing death. She is also disqualified from holding or obtaining a driving licence for eight years after her release. Another charge over driving without due care and attention thereby causing hurt was taken into consideration for sentencing. The private-hire driver had previously pleaded guilty to two counts of negligent and careless driving on Feb. 10, 2026. Ran red light On the day of the incident, she failed to notice that the traffic light had already turned red for seven seconds and proceeded to travel across a road junction in Eunos. Bok was driving along Changi Road towards Geylang Road on the night on Mar. 26, 2024 at about 11:40pm. After dropping off a passenger, she had wanted to wait for customers in Geylang, where demand tended to be higher. While driving to the junction of Changi Road and Jalan Eunos, she was distracted by her search for customers and failed to notice that the traffic light had turned red. Seven seconds later, Bok ran the red light and crossed the stop line, colliding with the motorcycle that was travelling along Jalan Eunos and had the right of way. Another car was also struck in the incident. Image via court documents Image via court documents Image via court documents Flung off, died The motorcyclist, Wong Jun Jie, was flung off his bike upon impact and fell onto the lane where traffic was coming in the opposite direction. He was reportedly seriously injured and sent to Changi General Hospital, where he underwent surgery. However, he later fell into a vegetative state and his family decided to take him off life support when he did not recover from his injuries after more than two weeks and showed no signs of improvement. He passed away on Apr. 14, 2024. 'Thinking about work' Following the accident, Bok said in court that she missed the red light due to the festive lights on the road at the time of the accident, as well as her unfamiliarity with the area. Her lawyer argued that as she was not under the influence of alcohol or drugs, and was not speeding, but only thinking about work, her sentence should be no more than six months in prison. Traffic...

title: Transport Department raises fees at 11 government car parks starting Mar 1
content: The Transport Department will increase charges at 11 government public car parks from March 1, with private car monthly rent up by HK$150 and hourly rate by HK$1.Private car, taxi, and light goods vehicle monthly parking permits will rise by HK$150, hourly rates by HK$1, daytime parking by HK$10, and overnight parking by HK$5.Motorcycle monthly permits will increase by HK$60, daytime parking by HK$2, and overnight by HK$1, while hourly rates remain unchanged.The affected car parks are Kennedy Town Car Park, Rumsey Street Car Park, Star Ferry Car Park, City Hall Car Park, Tin Hau Car Park, Shau Kei Wan Car Park, Aberdeen Car Park, Sheung Fung Street Car Park, Wong Tai Sin Car Park, Kwai Fong Car Park, and Tsuen Wan Car Park.","content_image_urls":null,"digest":"The Transport title: US and Israel launch "pre-emptive" attack against Iran
content: Israel said it launched a pre-emptive attack against Iran on Saturday, pushing the Middle East into a renewed military confrontation and further dimming hopes for a diplomatic solution to Tehran's long-running nuclear dispute with the West.The New York Times, citing a U.S. official, reported that U.S. strikes on Iran were underway. A source told Reuters that Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, was not in Tehran and had been transferred to a secure location.The attack, coming after Israel and Iran engaged in a 12-day air war in June, follows repeated U.S.-Israeli warnings that they would strike again if Iran pressed ahead with its nuclear and ballistic missile programmes."The State of Israel launched a pre-emptive attack against Iran to remove threats to the State of Israel," Defence Minister Israel Katz said.An Israeli defence official said the operation had been planned for months in coordination with Washington, and that the launch date was decided weeks ago.Explosions were heard in Tehran on Saturday, Iranian media reported, and sirens sounded across Israel around 08:15 local time in what the military said was a proactive alert to prepare the public for the possibility of an incoming missile strike.The Israeli military announced the closure of schools and workplaces, with exceptions for essential sectors, and a ban on public airspace. Israel closed its airspace to civilian flights, and the airports authority asked the public not to go to any of the country's airports.The U.S. and Iran renewed negotiations in February in a bid to resolve the decades-long dispute through diplomacy and avert the threat of a military confrontation that could destabilise the region.Israel, however, insisted that any U.S. deal with Iran must include the dismantling of Tehran's nuclear infrastructure, not just stopping the enrichment process, and lobbied Washington to include restrictions on Iran's missile programme in the talks.Iran said it was prepared to discuss curbs on its nuclear programme in exchange for lifting sanctions but ruled out linking the issue to missiles.Tehran also said it would defend itself against any attack.It warned neighbouring countries hosting U.S. troops that it would retaliate against American bases if Washington struck Iran.In June, the U.S. joined an Israeli military campaign against Iranian nuclear installations, in the most direct American military action ever against the Islamic Republic.Tehran retaliated then by launching missiles...

title: There were self doubts: Kerr opens up on journey
content: Matildas captain Sam Kerr has opened up about the self doubts that crept in during her comeback from a knee injury, saying she is still about 15% off from her usual self. A normal recovery period from surgery for an ACL tear is 9-12 months, but Kerr spent a frustrating 18 months out of the game before making her highly-anticipated return in September. A problem with a surgical graft that went undiscovered for 10 months was the reason behind the extended recovery period, but Kerr is back firing ahead of Australia 's Asian Cup opener against the Philippines in Perth on Sunday. The 32-year-old Chelsea star fronted the media on Saturday and reflected on her "long and hard journey" to be back in full flight. - Ten players to watch at the 2026 AFC Women's Asian Cup - Why the Philippines can create history at the Women's Asian Cup - Why the 2026 Women's Asian Cup feels career-defining for Sam Kerr "It's kind of come in waves," Kerr said. "I think at the start when I came back from the ACL with Chelsea at the start of the season I felt really good. "And then I probably had a little bit of a dip, and then I felt from December onwards, when I started scoring a few more goals and just feeling relaxed and confident in my ability again, I started to really feel at my best. "I feel like I'm just trying to get my confidence back. When you're out for so long, you kind of have all this self doubt creep in and all of that. "But I've had so many amazing people around me, and I feel right at home with the Matildas, so it's a good place for me to just settle back in and be myself." So where is she on a scale of one to 100 right now? "I feel like I'm probably 85 and above," Kerr said. "I don't want to say I'm at 100 yet. I haven't had one of those games yet where I felt completely myself, but I think about 85% and above." The Matildas have won the Asian Cup only once -- back in 2010 when Kerr was just 16 years old. Kerr is the only remaining member of that squad who is still playing. "That makes me sad that I'm the last one standing," Kerr said. "Still to this day, that is one of the best moments in my footballing career. "And I know how much this team wants to win something together. I know how much every player wants to win something for the Matildas." Matildas mania swept Australia during the team's run to the semi-finals of the 2023 Women's World Cup on home soil. Kerr tore her left calf on the eve of that tournament, and then injured her right calf in the third-place...

title: SpaceX plans $1.75T IPO, could file as early as March
content: SpaceX is reportedly preparing for a confidential initial public offering (IPO) that could value the company at over $1.75 trillion, according to Bloomberg. The filing could take place as early as March, marking one of the largest IPOs in history. However, plans are still tentative and SpaceX may choose to postpone its listing. Along with the potential IPO, Musk also plans to test-launch a new version of SpaceX's next-generation Starship rocket in March. The upcoming launch will feature hundreds of upgrades and comes after a months-long hiatus due to engineering challenges. The company's last 11 test launches since 2023 have been high-profile events, some resulting in total or partial failure. SpaceX generated some $8 billion in profit on $15-16 billion of revenue last year, primarily from its Starlink satellite internet service. The service accounts for 50-80% of the company's total revenue. Earlier this year, SpaceX also acquired Musk's artificial intelligence (AI) start-up xAI in an all-stock deal that valued the combined entity at $1.25 trillion.
creator: akash pandey

title: Israel, US strike Iran after weeks of warnings; Tehran hit
content: Israel has launched a preemptive attack on Iran, with the United States joining in the strikes. The attack, codenamed Operation Shield of Judah, targeted multiple government buildings, including the presidential complex, which was also reportedly hit. Explosions were heard in Tehran on Saturday morning, including near the offices of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. However, media reports suggest that Khamenei was not present in Tehran and had been moved to a safe location. Israeli Defense Minister Israel Katz confirmed the attack, saying it was carried out to remove threats. The Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) also issued a statement warning citizens to stay close to protected spaces due to possible missile threats. Katz also declared an immediate state of emergency throughout the entire country. The United States has joined Israel in the renewed strikes against Iran. A US official and a source familiar with the operation confirmed this to the Associated Press. However, details about casualties or injuries from these strikes are yet to be disclosed by officials. Tehran officials responded sharply, saying they are preparing for retaliation. The response will be crushing, an Iranian official told Reuters. The strikes come amid rising tensions between Iran and the United States over Tehran's nuclear program. Both the US and Israel have repeatedly warned of more strikes if Iran continues with its nuclear and ballistic missile programs. The Isfahan, where Iran's Nuclear Technology and Research Centre is located, was also among the sites targeted, along with other locations such as Tabriz, which hosts a missile base. Earlier this month, US-Iran negotiations aimed at resolving the dispute through diplomacy were renewed, but Israel insisted any deal must include dismantling Tehran's nuclear infrastructure. While Iran has expressed willingness to discuss curbs on its nuclear program in exchange for lifted sanctions, it has ruled out linking the issue to missiles. This diplomatic deadlock continues even as US-Iran negotiations were renewed earlier this month in a bid to resolve the decades-long dispute through diplomacy.
creator: snehil singh

title: Rohit Shetty house firing: Nepal funding link found in probe
content: The recent attack on filmmaker Rohit Shetty's residence in Juhu, Mumbai, has revealed shocking international links. The Mumbai Police have found that the attackers received funds from an unidentified person into their bank accounts and withdrew cash from ATMs, reported IANS. This discovery suggests a larger conspiracy behind the attack. To trace this money trail, banks have been ordered to provide detailed account statements and transaction histories of those involved. The investigation has also revealed potential funding routes linked to Nepal. Authorities are now looking into a possible connection to what is being called the Agra module. The Mumbai Police have formed multiple special teams to expedite the investigation and identify the mastermind behind this attack, reported The Times of India. On January 31, five rounds of bullets were fired at Shetty's Juhu residence. Fortunately, no injuries were reported. The Mumbai Crime Branch investigation revealed that the vehicle used in this attack was sourced from Pune. The car belonged to a man from Pune who sold it to Aditya Gayki, one of the arrested accused, for â‚¹30,000 just days before the incident. Gayki and another accused, Samarth Pomaji, had reportedly left the vehicle at a pre-decided spot in Juhu. The Crime Branch stated that those who bought the car and drove it to Mumbai were unaware of the shooter's identity. Subsequently, Shubham Lonkar, an alleged member of the Lawrence Bishnoi group, instructed the shooter to collect the vehicle from its location and open fire. The Mumbai Police have reportedly made a total of 12 arrests so far.
creator: isha sharma

title: Vijay's wife files for divorce: Looking at their relationship timeline
content: Actor-politician Joseph Vijay Chandrasekhar, popularly known as Thalapathy Vijay, has hit headlines again as his wife Sankgeetha Sornalingam has filed for divorce. The petition was filed at the District Court in Chengalpattu, Tamil Nadu, under Sections 27(1)(a), (b), and (d) along with Sections 36 and 37 of the Special Marriage Act, 1954. In her petition, Sornalingam has accused Vijay of having an extramarital relationship (with a female actor). Here's a look at their relationship timeline. Sornalingam, a die-hard fan of Vijay, first met him in 1996. She had traveled from the UK to Chennai to congratulate him on the success of his film Poove Unakkaga. Impressed by her, Vijay invited her to his home and introduced her to his parents. Later on, it was the actor's parents who proposed the idea of marriage between the two. They reportedly dated from 1996 to 1999. Vijay (Christian) and Sornalingam (Hindu) had an interfaith marriage on August 25, 1999. Their first child, a son, was born on August 26, 2000. They welcomed their daughter Divya Saasha in 2005. Despite their high-profile lives, Sornalingam has largely stayed away from the media. She has rarely attended movie events or political gatherings linked to Vijay's growing political ambitions. In her divorce petition, Sornalingam has alleged that Vijay was involved in an extramarital affair with another actor since April 2021. She claims this caused her deep emotional pain and mental suffering, amounting to betrayal and violation of marital trust. The petition also alleges public humiliation from social media posts, emotional neglect, and constructive desertion. It further states that efforts between September 2021 and February 2022, and August 2024 and February 2025 to settle the matter amicably have failed. Meanwhile, Vijay's film Jana Nayagan, initially scheduled for a January 9 release during the Pongal season, has been indefinitely postponed due to a lack of CBFC approval. The board had earlier indicated that the movie could be granted a U/A certificate after necessary cuts were made. However, it was later sent to a revising committee following a fresh complaint from an examining committee member who had originally reviewed the film.

Taapsee Pannu says she lost films because heroes did not want her opposite them
content: Actor Taapsee Pannu has spoken candidly about the realities of Bollywood, revealing that she has at times lost films because a leading hero did not want her cast opposite him. In a recent conversation, she addressed whether her outspoken nature has ever cost her work and admitted that industry politics often play a role in casting decisions.Taapsee Pannu on losing out on projectsTaapsee shared that while she is not always told the exact reason why a project slips away, she has come to understand that in some cases the male leadâ€™s preference influences the final decision. She explained that in many mainstream films built around a conventional hero heroine pairing, the heroâ€™s comfort and choice can weigh heavily on who gets selected. Sometimes, she said plainly, the hero does not want you in the film.Reflecting on her journey, Taapsee pointed out that strong directors who are confident about their vision can change that narrative. She cited her casting in Dunki as an example of how a filmmakerâ€™s conviction can override typical industry assumptions. In projects where the director truly believes an actor fits the part, things tend to fall into place regardless of outside perceptions.On choosing unconventional rolesThe actor also addressed the occasional label of being difficult to work with. She dismissed such claims, saying her filmography speaks for itself. Repeated collaborations with filmmakers, she argued, would not happen if she were genuinely hard to manage on set. According to her, such perceptions are often formed by those who have not worked with her personally.Taapsee acknowledged that she is not someone who socialises extensively within the industry and prefers to maintain a degree of distance off camera. However, she believes in letting her work define her rather than networking or fitting into expected equations. She added that she is not anyoneâ€™s regular pairing and does not chase projects simply to align with a particular star.Known for choosing unconventional and performance driven roles, Taapsee said she has learned to accept the ups and downs that come with the industry. For her, staying true to her choices matters more than fitting into established formulas.
creator: mid-day

title: Hello Bachhon trailer: A tale of students who refused to give up on their dreams
content: Hello Bachhon - a greeting that didnâ€™t just start classes, but started a movement. Netflix has unveiled the trailer of its upcoming series, inspired by the extraordinary journey of educator Alakh Pandey, whose voice reached far beyond the classroom and into the homes and hearts of students across India. Premiering on March 6, the series tells the story of students who refused to give up on their dreams, strengthened by the support of a teacher who believed in them when it mattered most.Hello Bacchon trailerWhat began as a modest classroom initiative soon grew into a movement that reached students across cities, towns and the smallest bylanes of India. In the trailer, we see glimpses of the very different realities the students come from, yet they are united by one shared dream. One boy struggles against financial hardship, a young girl resists expectations that could cut short her education, and another quietly sets aside his passion for cricket to shoulder responsibility at home. Through their journeys, we come to understand why education is not a privilege reserved for a few but a right that can change the direction of a life.Directed by Pratish Mehta, with Viineet Kumar Singh leading the cast alongside Vikram Kochhar and Girija Oak Godbole, the series is further elevated by strong performances from Satendra Soni, Sonu Kumar Yadav, Anshul Dogra, Samta Sudiksha, Varun Buddhadev and Naman Jain, who sensitively portray five unique stories of students navigating challenges and rising against all odds.Created by Abhishek Yadav and co-written with Ankit Yadav, Vernaali and Sandeep Singh, Hello Bachhon marks another collaboration between Netflix and TVF that brings to screen a story rooted in the aspirations and resilience of young India.`Captures emotions of different Indias`Arunabh Kumar, Founder & CEO, TVF shared, â€œHello Bachhon is a truly special series for us. It follows two journeys unfolding in parallel - a teacher who recognised that the hunger to learn exists everywhere, and students navigating their own hardships within a competitive system. What moved us most were the real anecdotes behind these student stories from such diverse & underprivileged backgrounds, and the moments where belief changed the course of their path. The series captures emotions of Different Indias and how the journeys of student and a Teacher, intersect to build something meaningful. Through our partnership with Netflix, weâ€™re excited to bring this layered, heartfelt story to...
creator: mid-day

OÌ‚ng Yang Zhiyong, ChuÌ‰ tiÌ£ch HoÌ£c vieÌ£Ì‚n Khoa hoÌ£c taÌ€i chiÌnh Trung QuoÌ‚Ìc, nhaÌ£Ì‚n Ä‘iÌ£nh Ä‘eÌ‚Ì€ xuaÌ‚Ìt naÌ€y hoaÌ€n toaÌ€n phuÌ€ hoÌ›Ì£p voÌ›Ìi xu huÌ›oÌ›Ìng quoÌ‚Ìc teÌ‚Ì vaÌ€ "veÌ‚Ì€ coÌ› baÌ‰n Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c thuÌc Ä‘aÌ‚Ì‰y boÌ›Ì‰i nhuÌ›Ìƒng thaÌch thuÌ›Ìc suÌ›Ìc khoÌ‰e nghieÌ‚m troÌ£ng maÌ€ con nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i Ä‘ang Ä‘oÌ‚Ìi maÌ£Ì†t". ThaÌng 7 naÌ†m ngoaÌi, WHO Ä‘aÌƒ khuyeÌ‚Ìn nghiÌ£ caÌc quoÌ‚Ìc gia aÌp muÌ›Ìc thueÌ‚Ì iÌt nhaÌ‚Ìt 20% giaÌ baÌn leÌ‰ Ä‘oÌ‚Ì€ uoÌ‚Ìng coÌ Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng, huÌ›oÌ›Ìng toÌ›Ìi muÌ£c tieÌ‚u taÌ†ng giaÌ caÌc maÌ£Ì†t haÌ€ng naÌ€y theÌ‚m 50% vaÌ€o naÌ†m 2035. title: MaÌy bay Pakistan roÌ›i oÌ›Ì‰ Afghanistan, phi coÌ‚ng biÌ£ baÌ†Ìt soÌ‚Ìng
content: Theo HaÌƒng tin AFP, ngaÌ€y 28-2, moÌ£Ì‚t maÌy bay tieÌ‚m kiÌch cuÌ‰a Pakistan Ä‘aÌƒ biÌ£ baÌ†Ìn haÌ£ taÌ£i thaÌ€nh phoÌ‚Ì Jalalabad (mieÌ‚Ì€n Ä‘oÌ‚ng Afghanistan), phi coÌ‚ng nhaÌ‰y duÌ€ vaÌ€ biÌ£ luÌ›Ì£c luÌ›oÌ›Ì£ng Afghanistan baÌ†Ìt giuÌ›Ìƒ, quaÌ‚n Ä‘oÌ£Ì‚i vaÌ€ caÌ‰nh saÌt nuÌ›oÌ›Ìc naÌ€y cho bieÌ‚Ìt ngaÌ€y 28-2. Theo nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i phaÌt ngoÌ‚n caÌ‰nh saÌt Tayeb Hammad, chieÌ‚Ìc tieÌ‚m kiÌch biÌ£ baÌ†Ìn roÌ›i oÌ›Ì‰ quaÌ£Ì‚n 6 cuÌ‰a Jalalabad, phi coÌ‚ng biÌ£ baÌ†Ìt soÌ‚Ìng. QuaÌ‚n Ä‘oÌ£Ì‚i mieÌ‚Ì€n Ä‘oÌ‚ng Afghanistan cuÌƒng xaÌc nhaÌ£Ì‚n maÌy bay Pakistan biÌ£ luÌ›Ì£c luÌ›oÌ›Ì£ng nuÌ›oÌ›Ìc naÌ€y baÌ†Ìn haÌ£ vaÌ€ baÌ†Ìt giuÌ›Ìƒ phi coÌ‚ng. NguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i daÌ‚n Ä‘iÌ£a phuÌ›oÌ›ng noÌi voÌ›Ìi AFP raÌ†Ì€ng nguÌ›oÌ›Ì€i naÌ€y Ä‘aÌƒ nhaÌ‰y duÌ€ khoÌ‰i maÌy bay truÌ›oÌ›Ìc khi biÌ£ baÌ†Ìt. TruÌ›oÌ›Ìc Ä‘oÌ, moÌ£Ì‚t phoÌng vieÌ‚n AFP taÌ£i hieÌ£Ì‚n truÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng cho bieÌ‚Ìt Ä‘aÌƒ nghe thaÌ‚Ìy tieÌ‚Ìng maÌy bay phaÌ‰n luÌ›Ì£c bay qua Jalalabad, sau Ä‘oÌ laÌ€ hai tieÌ‚Ìng noÌ‚Ì‰ tuÌ›Ì€ huÌ›oÌ›Ìng saÌ‚n bay thaÌ€nh phoÌ‚Ì. HieÌ£Ì‚n phiÌa Pakistan, quaÌ‚n Ä‘oÌ£Ì‚i vaÌ€ BoÌ£Ì‚ ThoÌ‚ng tin vaÌ‚Ìƒn chuÌ›a Ä‘uÌ›a ra phaÌ‰n hoÌ‚Ì€i veÌ‚Ì€ vuÌ£ vieÌ£Ì‚c. DieÌ‚Ìƒn bieÌ‚Ìn moÌ›Ìi nhaÌ‚Ìt naÌ€y xaÌ‰y ra trong boÌ‚Ìi caÌ‰nh caÌ†ng thaÌ†Ì‰ng giuÌ›Ìƒa hai nuÌ›oÌ›Ìc Ä‘ang leo thang khi Pakistan tieÌ‚Ìn haÌ€nh khoÌ‚ng kiÌch thuÌ‰ Ä‘oÌ‚ Kabul vaÌ€ thaÌ€nh phoÌ‚Ì Kandahar, noÌ›i ThuÌ‰ liÌƒnh toÌ‚Ìi cao Taliban Hibatullah Akhundzada Ä‘aÌ£Ì†t truÌ£ soÌ›Ì‰. TruÌ›oÌ›Ìc Ä‘oÌ, luÌ›Ì£c luÌ›oÌ›Ì£ng Afghanistan cuÌƒng Ä‘aÌƒ moÌ›Ì‰ chieÌ‚Ìn diÌ£ch taÌ‚Ìn coÌ‚ng bieÌ‚n gioÌ›Ìi nhaÌ†Ì€m vaÌ€o Pakistan, Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c chiÌnh phuÌ‰ do Taliban laÌƒnh Ä‘aÌ£o moÌ‚ taÌ‰ laÌ€ Ä‘oÌ£Ì‚ng thaÌi Ä‘aÌp traÌ‰ caÌc cuoÌ£Ì‚c taÌ‚Ìn coÌ‚ng truÌ›oÌ›Ìc Ä‘oÌ cuÌ‰a Islamabad.

title: BlackPink laÌ£Ì‚p kyÌ‰ luÌ£c moÌ›Ìi cho K-pop
content: NgaÌ€y 28-2, YG Entertainment xaÌc nhaÌ£Ì‚n mini album Deadline cuÌ‰a BlackPink baÌn Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c 1.461.785 baÌ‰n chiÌ‰ trong moÌ£Ì‚t ngaÌ€y, theo thoÌ‚Ìng keÌ‚ cuÌ‰a Hanteo Chart. VoÌ›Ìi Deadline , BlackPink Ä‘aÌƒ vuÌ›oÌ›Ì£t qua coÌ£Ì‚t moÌ‚Ìc naÌ€y ngay trong ngaÌ€y phaÌt haÌ€nh. CuÌ€ng voÌ›Ìi thaÌ€nh tiÌch doanh soÌ‚Ì, mini album Deadline cuÌƒng cho thaÌ‚Ìy suÌ›Ìc huÌt maÌ£nh meÌƒ treÌ‚n caÌc baÌ‰ng xeÌ‚Ìp haÌ£ng toaÌ€n caÌ‚Ì€u. Album Ä‘uÌ›Ìng Ä‘aÌ‚Ì€u baÌ‰ng xeÌ‚Ìp haÌ£ng Top Album cuÌ‰a iTunes taÌ£i 32 khu vuÌ›Ì£c, Ä‘oÌ‚Ì€ng thoÌ›Ì€i Ä‘aÌ£t viÌ£ triÌ soÌ‚Ì 1 treÌ‚n baÌ‰ng xeÌ‚Ìp haÌ£ng Worldwide iTunes Album Chart. Ca khuÌc chuÌ‰ Ä‘eÌ‚Ì€ Go cuÌƒng ghi nhaÌ£Ì‚n thuÌ›Ì haÌ£ng cao treÌ‚n caÌc neÌ‚Ì€n taÌ‰ng nhaÌ£c soÌ‚Ì trong nuÌ›oÌ›Ìc. TiÌnh Ä‘eÌ‚Ìn 10h saÌng 28-2, baÌ€i haÌt xeÌ‚Ìp viÌ£ triÌ thuÌ›Ì 8 treÌ‚n baÌ‰ng Top 100 cuÌ‰a Melon. NhuÌ›Ìƒng hiÌ€nh aÌ‰nh laÌ‚Ìy boÌ‚Ìi caÌ‰nh khoÌ‚ng gian vuÌƒ truÌ£, vuÌ€ng aÌnh saÌng vaÌ€ caÌc taÌ‚Ì€ng Ä‘iÌ£a chaÌ‚Ìt khoÌ‚Ì‰ng loÌ‚Ì€ Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c gioÌ›Ìi thieÌ£Ì‚u nhuÌ› Ä‘ieÌ‚Ì‰m nhaÌ‚Ìn thiÌ£ giaÌc noÌ‚Ì‰i baÌ£Ì‚t. PhaÌ‚Ì€n Ä‘ieÌ£Ì‚p khuÌc buÌ€ng noÌ‚Ì‰ cuÌ€ng giai Ä‘ieÌ£Ì‚u gaÌ‚y nghieÌ£Ì‚n taÌ£o neÌ‚n daÌ‚Ìu aÌ‚Ìn maÌ£nh meÌƒ, ca tuÌ›Ì€ theÌ‚Ì‰ hieÌ£Ì‚n suÌ›Ì£ tuÌ›Ì£ tin Ä‘aÌ£Ì†c truÌ›ng cuÌ‰a nhoÌm, khaÌ†Ì‰ng Ä‘iÌ£nh Ä‘iÌ£nh huÌ›oÌ›Ìng vuÌ›oÌ›n toÌ›Ìi nhuÌ›Ìƒng Ä‘iÌ‰nh cao moÌ›Ìi trong tuÌ›oÌ›ng lai. SpaÌˆte Strafe gegen Marc Marquez macht Acosta zum Sprintsieger
content: Marc Marquez, der grosse Favorit auf den neuerlichen Titelgewinn, verpasste damit den perfekten Saisonstart. Dem fuÌˆr Ducati fahrenden Spanier, der mit einem achten WM-Titel in der KoÌˆnigsklasse zu Rekordhalter Giacomo Agostini aufschliessen koÌˆnnte, wurde im Sprintrennen auf dem Circuit von Buriram in der zweitletzten von 13 Runden ein UÌˆberholmanoÌˆver gegen Pedro Acosta zum VerhaÌˆngnis, das die Rennleitung als regelwidrig taxierte. Kurz vor dem Ziel erhielt Marquez deshalb die Anweisung, er muÌˆsse die FuÌˆhrung wieder an seinen Landsmann zuruÌˆckgeben, woraufhin dieser seinen ersten Sieg in der MotoGP feierte. Acosta, 2023 Weltmeister in der Moto2, duÌˆrfte naÌˆchste Saison bei Ducati Teamkollege von Marc Marquez werden. Das Podest komplettierte als Dritter Raul Fernandez auf Aprilia. FuÌˆr Marco Bezzecchi, Marc Marquez' womoÌˆglich groÌˆsster Herausforderer in dieser Saison, war das Rennen schon in der 2. Runde gelaufen. Der aus der Pole-Position gestartete Italiener rutschte mit seiner Aprilia in einer Rechtskurve in FuÌˆhrung liegend von der Strecke und musste danach aufgeben. FuÌˆr den WM-Dritten des Vorjahres war es bereits der dritte Sturz an diesem Wochenende, nach je einem im Training und Qualifying.

content: BaÌ‚Ìt keÌ‚Ì‰ nhuÌ›Ìƒng thay Ä‘oÌ‚Ì‰i veÌ‚Ì€ chiÌnh saÌch thueÌ‚Ì, loÌ£Ì‚ triÌ€nh chuyeÌ‚Ì‰n Ä‘oÌ‚Ì‰i xanh cuÌ€ng bieÌ‚Ìn Ä‘oÌ£Ì‚ng cuÌ‰a neÌ‚Ì€n kinh teÌ‚Ì, nhu caÌ‚Ì€u mua saÌ†Ìm oÌ‚ toÌ‚ moÌ›Ìi vaÌ‚Ìƒn gia taÌ†ng, taÌ£o Ä‘oÌ£Ì‚ng luÌ›Ì£c giuÌp doanh soÌ‚Ì nhieÌ‚Ì€u nhaÌ€ saÌ‰n xuaÌ‚Ìt oÌ‚ toÌ‚ taÌ†ng truÌ›oÌ›Ì‰ng trong naÌ†m 2025. Theo caÌ£Ì‚p nhaÌ£Ì‚t moÌ›Ìi nhaÌ‚Ìt cuÌ‰a trang Car News China , baÌ‰ng xeÌ‚Ìp haÌ£ng 10 nhaÌ€ saÌ‰n xuaÌ‚Ìt oÌ‚ toÌ‚ coÌ doanh soÌ‚Ì cao nhaÌ‚Ìt theÌ‚Ì gioÌ›Ìi naÌ†m 2025 Ä‘aÌƒ Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì£c hoaÌ€n thieÌ£Ì‚n sau khi TaÌ£Ì‚p Ä‘oaÌ€n Stellantis vuÌ›Ì€a coÌ‚ng boÌ‚Ì baÌo caÌo taÌ€i chiÌnh vaÌ€o cuoÌ‚Ìi thaÌng 2.2026. Trong Ä‘oÌ, caÌc nhaÌ€ saÌ‰n xuaÌ‚Ìt oÌ‚ toÌ‚ Trung QuoÌ‚Ìc cho thaÌ‚Ìy buÌ›oÌ›Ìc tieÌ‚Ìn maÌ£nh meÌƒ cuÌ€ng suÌ›Ì£ aÌp Ä‘aÌ‰o khi coÌ toÌ›Ìi 3 caÌi teÌ‚n goÌp maÌ£Ì†t trong danh saÌch 10 nhaÌ€ saÌ‰n xuaÌ‚Ìt oÌ‚ toÌ‚ coÌ doanh soÌ‚Ì cao nhaÌ‚Ìt theÌ‚Ì gioÌ›Ìi. CaÌc nhaÌ€ saÌ‰n xuaÌ‚Ìt oÌ‚ toÌ‚ Trung QuoÌ‚Ìc cho thaÌ‚Ìy buÌ›oÌ›Ìc tieÌ‚Ìn maÌ£nh meÌƒ cuÌ€ng suÌ›Ì£ aÌp Ä‘aÌ‰o khi coÌ toÌ›Ìi 3 caÌi teÌ‚n goÌp maÌ£Ì†t trong danh saÌch 10 nhaÌ€ saÌ‰n xuaÌ‚Ìt oÌ‚ toÌ‚ coÌ doanh soÌ‚Ì cao nhaÌ‚Ìt theÌ‚Ì gioÌ›Ìi AÌ‰nh: B.H SuÌ›Ì£ thay Ä‘oÌ‚Ì‰i dieÌ‚Ìƒn ra oÌ›Ì‰ nuÌ›Ì‰a cuoÌ‚Ìi baÌ‰ng xeÌ‚Ìp haÌ£ng voÌ›Ìi suÌ›Ì£ goÌp maÌ£Ì†t cuÌ‰a ba nhaÌ€ saÌ‰n xuaÌ‚Ìt oÌ‚ toÌ‚ Trung QuoÌ‚Ìc goÌ‚Ì€m TaÌ£Ì‚p Ä‘oaÌ€n BYD, SAIC vaÌ€ Geely, giaÌn tieÌ‚Ìp Ä‘aÌ‚Ì‰y Honda xuoÌ‚Ìng cuoÌ‚Ìi baÌ‰ng xeÌ‚Ìp haÌ£ng Ä‘oÌ‚Ì€ng thoÌ›Ì€i Ä‘aÌnh baÌ£Ì‚t Nissan ra khoÌ‰i cuoÌ£Ì‚c Ä‘ua doanh soÌ‚Ì. Trong khi Ä‘oÌ, traÌ£Ì‚t tuÌ›Ì£ caÌ£nh tranh oÌ›Ì‰ nhoÌm daÌ‚Ìƒn Ä‘aÌ‚Ì€u vaÌ‚Ìƒn khoÌ‚ng coÌ nhieÌ‚Ì€u thay Ä‘oÌ‚Ì‰i. CaÌc oÌ‚ng loÌ›Ìn goÌ‚Ì€m TaÌ£Ì‚p Ä‘oaÌ€n Toyota, TaÌ£Ì‚p Ä‘oaÌ€n Volkswagen, Hyundai Motor vaÌ€ General Motors (GM) tieÌ‚Ìp tuÌ£c giuÌ›Ìƒ vuÌ›Ìƒng 4 viÌ£ triÌ daÌ‚Ìƒn Ä‘aÌ‚Ì€u. Trong Ä‘oÌ, TaÌ£Ì‚p Ä‘oaÌ€n Toyota (goÌ‚Ì€m caÌc thuÌ›oÌ›ng hieÌ£Ì‚u Toyota, Lexus, Hino, Daihatsu) daÌ‚Ìƒn Ä‘aÌ‚Ì€u voÌ›Ìi doanh soÌ‚Ì Ä‘aÌ£t 11,32 trieÌ£Ì‚u xe baÌn ra treÌ‚n toaÌ€n caÌ‚Ì€u, taÌ†ng 4,65% so voÌ›Ìi naÌ†m 2024. Hyundai Motor (goÌ‚Ì€m Hyundai, KIA, Genesis) xeÌ‚Ìp thuÌ›Ì ba voÌ›Ìi 7,27 trieÌ£Ì‚u xe; tieÌ‚Ìp Ä‘eÌ‚Ìn laÌ€ GM (goÌ‚Ì€m Chevrolet, Buick, Cadillac) Ä‘aÌ£t 6,18 trieÌ£Ì‚u xe, taÌ†ng 3,03% so voÌ›Ìi naÌ†m 2024. Theo caÌ£Ì‚p nhaÌ£Ì‚t moÌ›Ìi nhaÌ‚Ìt tuÌ›Ì€ soÌ‚Ì lieÌ£Ì‚u baÌo caÌo taÌ€i chiÌnh TaÌ£Ì‚p Ä‘oaÌ€n Stellantis (goÌ‚Ì€m moÌ£Ì‚t loaÌ£t thuÌ›oÌ›ng hieÌ£Ì‚u oÌ‚ toÌ‚ nhuÌ› Peugeot, Jeep, Fiat, Citroen...) giaÌ€nh viÌ£ triÌ thuÌ›Ì naÌ†m voÌ›Ìi doanh soÌ‚Ì baÌn vuÌ›oÌ›Ì£t muÌ›Ìc 5,4 trieÌ£Ì‚u xe, taÌ†ng 1,27% so voÌ›Ìi cuÌ€ng kyÌ€ naÌ†m 2024. 10 nhaÌ€ saÌ‰n xuaÌ‚Ìt oÌ‚ toÌ‚ coÌ doanh soÌ‚Ì cao nhaÌ‚Ìt theÌ‚Ì gioÌ›Ìi naÌ†m 2025 CaÌc nhaÌ€ saÌ‰n xuaÌ‚Ìt oÌ‚ toÌ‚...

content: NgaÌ€y 28.2, ÄoÌ£Ì‚i CSGT RaÌ£ch ChieÌ‚Ìc (PhoÌ€ng PC08, CoÌ‚ng an TP.HCM) cho bieÌ‚Ìt Ä‘oÌ›n viÌ£ Ä‘ang taÌ†ng cuÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng tuaÌ‚Ì€n tra, kieÌ‚Ì‰m soaÌt vaÌ€ xuÌ›Ì‰ lyÌ nghieÌ‚m caÌc haÌ€nh vi vi phaÌ£m taÌ£i khu vuÌ›Ì£c Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng ngang, haÌ€nh lang an toaÌ€n giao thoÌ‚ng Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng saÌ†Ìt , thuÌ›Ì£c hieÌ£Ì‚n chiÌ‰ Ä‘aÌ£o cuÌ‰a CuÌ£c CaÌ‰nh saÌt giao thoÌ‚ng (C08) sau vuÌ£ tai naÌ£n Ä‘aÌ£Ì†c bieÌ£Ì‚t nghieÌ‚m troÌ£ng xaÌ‰y ra toÌ‚Ìi 25.2 taÌ£i HaÌ€ NoÌ£Ì‚i. TaÌ€i xeÌ‚Ì Ä‘ieÌ‚Ì€u khieÌ‚Ì‰n xe duÌ›Ì€ng xe trong trong phaÌ£m vi haÌ€nh lang an toaÌ€n giao thoÌ‚ng Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng saÌ†Ìt seÌƒ biÌ£ laÌ£Ì‚p bieÌ‚n baÌ‰n xuÌ›Ì‰ lyÌ AÌ‰NH: CACC Theo Ä‘oÌ, vaÌ€o luÌc 15 gioÌ›Ì€ ngaÌ€y 27.2, ÄoÌ£Ì‚i CSGT RaÌ£ch ChieÌ‚Ìc Ä‘aÌƒ phoÌ‚Ìi hoÌ›Ì£p CoÌ‚ng an caÌc phuÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng HieÌ£Ì‚p BiÌ€nh, DiÌƒ An vaÌ€ TaÌ‚n ÄoÌ‚ng HieÌ£Ì‚p, nhuÌ›Ìƒng Ä‘iÌ£a baÌ€n coÌ tuyeÌ‚Ìn Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng saÌ†Ìt Ä‘i qua, toÌ‚Ì‰ chuÌ›Ìc ra quaÌ‚n kieÌ‚Ì‰m tra, ghi nhaÌ£Ì‚n vaÌ€ xuÌ›Ì‰ lyÌ caÌc truÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng hoÌ›Ì£p khoÌ‚ng chaÌ‚Ìp haÌ€nh quy Ä‘iÌ£nh khi luÌ›u thoÌ‚ng qua Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng ngang. KeÌ‚Ìt quaÌ‰, luÌ›Ì£c luÌ›oÌ›Ì£ng chuÌ›Ìc naÌ†ng Ä‘aÌƒ laÌ£Ì‚p bieÌ‚n baÌ‰n 5 truÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng hoÌ›Ì£p vi phaÌ£m loÌ‚Ìƒi duÌ›Ì€ng xe trong phaÌ£m vi haÌ€nh lang an toaÌ€n giao thoÌ‚ng Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng saÌ†Ìt. CuÌ£ theÌ‚Ì‰, ÄoÌ£Ì‚i CSGT RaÌ£ch ChieÌ‚Ìc phoÌ‚Ìi hoÌ›Ì£p CoÌ‚ng an phuÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng HieÌ£Ì‚p BiÌ€nh xuÌ›Ì‰ lyÌ 2 vuÌ£; phoÌ‚Ìi hoÌ›Ì£p CoÌ‚ng an phuÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng DiÌƒ An laÌ£Ì‚p bieÌ‚n baÌ‰n 2 vuÌ£; vaÌ€ phoÌ‚Ìi hoÌ›Ì£p CoÌ‚ng an phuÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng TaÌ‚n ÄoÌ‚ng HieÌ£Ì‚p laÌ£Ì‚p bieÌ‚n baÌ‰n 1 vuÌ£. ÄoÌ£Ì‚i CSGT RaÌ£ch ChieÌ‚Ìc ra quaÌ‚n phoÌ‚Ìi hoÌ›Ì£p coÌ‚ng an caÌc phuÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng xuÌ›Ì‰ lyÌ vi phaÌ£m an toaÌ€n giao thoÌ‚ng Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng saÌ†Ìt AÌ‰NH: CACC Trong quaÌ triÌ€nh tuaÌ‚Ì€n tra treÌ‚n tuyeÌ‚Ìn Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng Kha VaÌ£n CaÌ‚n (phuÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng HieÌ£Ì‚p BiÌ€nh), toÌ‚Ì‰ coÌ‚ng taÌc phaÌt hieÌ£Ì‚n oÌ‚ng N.V.P Ä‘ieÌ‚Ì€u khieÌ‚Ì‰n xe bieÌ‚Ì‰n soÌ‚Ì 67L1-391.xx duÌ›Ì€ng xe trong phaÌ£m vi haÌ€nh lang an toaÌ€n giao thoÌ‚ng Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng saÌ†Ìt neÌ‚n laÌ£Ì‚p bieÌ‚n baÌ‰n xuÌ›Ì‰ lyÌ. TuÌ›oÌ›ng tuÌ›Ì£, truÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng hoÌ›Ì£p N.L.M.H Ä‘ieÌ‚Ì€u khieÌ‚Ì‰n xe bieÌ‚Ì‰n soÌ‚Ì 59X2-936.xx duÌ›Ì€ng xe trong phaÌ£m vi haÌ€nh lang an toaÌ€n giao thoÌ‚ng Ä‘uÌ›oÌ›Ì€ng saÌ†Ìt cuÌƒng biÌ£ xuÌ›Ì‰ lyÌ theo quy Ä‘iÌ£nh. KadÄ±nÄ±n babasÄ±ndan maasÌ§ alma hakkÄ±nÄ±n, esÌ§inin 2008 sonrasÄ± vefatÄ±yla dogÌ†dugÌ†unu belirleyen YargÄ±tay, bu nedenle 5510 sayÄ±lÄ± Kanun huÌˆkuÌˆmlerinin uygulanacagÌ†Ä±nÄ± ifade etti. Bu kanun hem esÌ§ten hem babadan aynÄ± anda iki oÌˆluÌˆm aylÄ±gÌ†Ä± bagÌ†lanmasÄ±na izin vermiyor. Karar, benzer durumda olanlar icÌ§in emsal niteligÌ†i tasÌ§Ä±yor. "HAKKIM BAKIÌ‡DIÌ‡R DUÌˆSÌ§UÌˆNCESIÌ‡ HER ZAMAN GECÌ§ERLIÌ‡ OLMUYOR" SGK Eski BasÌ§muÌˆfettisÌ§i IÌ‡sa KarakasÌ§ ise TuÌˆrkiye Gazetesiâ€™nde koÌˆsÌ§esinde konu ile ilgili degÌ†erlendirmede bulundu. KarakasÌ§, sigortalÄ±ya ait sÌ§artlarÄ±n oÌˆluÌˆm tarihinde, hak sahibine dair sÌ§artlarÄ±n ise "hak sahipligÌ†i sÄ±fatÄ±nÄ±n kazanÄ±ldÄ±gÌ†Ä±" tarihte yuÌˆruÌˆrluÌˆkte oldugÌ†u kanuna goÌˆre belirlendigÌ†ini soÌˆyledi. esÌ§in vefatÄ± 1 Ekim 2008'den sonra gercÌ§eklesÌ§tigÌ†i icÌ§in, bu tarihte yuÌˆruÌˆrluÌˆkte olan mevzuatÄ±n gecÌ§erli oldugÌ†unu belirten KarakasÌ§, kanunun sadece yuÌˆksek olanÄ± tercih edilmesine imkan tanÄ±gÌ†Ä±nÄ± belirtti. IÌ‡kinci bir maasÌ§ icÌ§in gerekli olan 'dul kalma' veya 'isÌ§ten ayrÄ±lma' gibi sÌ§artlarÄ±n gercÌ§eklesÌ§tigÌ†i tarihteki kanun, cebinize girecek ikinci maasÌ§Ä± belirliyor. Sistemin suÌˆrduÌˆruÌˆlebilirligÌ†i acÌ§Ä±sÄ±ndan, cÌ§ift aylÄ±k oÌˆdemelerinin sÄ±nÄ±rlandÄ±rÄ±lmasÄ± ve guÌˆncel kanunlarÄ±n uygulanmasÄ± konusundaki hukuki netlik tescillenmisÌ§ oldu" ifadelerini kullandÄ±.

IÌ‡ran Resmi Haber AjansÄ±, Tahran'da uÌˆniversite caddesine roket duÌˆsÌ§tuÌˆ, 3 patlama sesi duyuldugÌ†unu acÌ§Ä±kladÄ±.Tahran'Ä±n kuzeyinde 2 patlama daha oldugÌ†u belirtiliyor. ABD: IÌ‡RAN'A SALDIRIYI IÌ‡SRAIÌ‡L'LE ORTAK DUÌˆZENLEDIÌ‡K Bir ABD'li yetkili, Katar merkezli yayÄ±n kurulusÌ§u Al Jazeera'ye yaptÄ±gÌ†Ä± acÌ§Ä±klamada, IÌ‡ran'a yoÌˆnelik saldÄ±rÄ±larÄ±n ABD ve IÌ‡srail tarafÄ±ndan ortaklasÌ§a yuÌˆruÌˆtuÌˆlen bir askeri operasyon kapsamÄ±nda gercÌ§eklesÌ§tirildigÌ†ini soÌˆyledi. Yetkili, operasyonun detaylarÄ±na ilisÌ§kin kapsamlÄ± bilgi paylasÌ§mazken, saldÄ±rÄ±larÄ±n iki uÌˆlkenin koordinasyonu ile planlandÄ±gÌ†Ä±nÄ± ve icra edildigÌ†ini belirtti. IÌ‡RAN HAVA SAHASINI KAPATTI IÌ‡ran Sivil HavacÄ±lÄ±k Kurumu SoÌˆzcuÌˆsuÌˆ Mecid Ahavan, yayÄ±mlanan NOTAM (HavacÄ±lara Bildiri) kapsamÄ±nda uÌˆlkenin hava sahasÄ±nÄ±n ikinci bir duyuruya kadar ucÌ§usÌ§lara kapatÄ±ldÄ±gÌ†Ä±nÄ± acÌ§Ä±kladÄ±. IÌ‡RAN'DAN MIÌ‡SIÌ‡LLEME MESAJI IÌ‡ran medyasÄ±, IÌ‡srail'in Tahran, Kum, Kerec ve KirmansÌ§ah sÌ§ehirlerini hedef aldÄ±gÌ†Ä±nÄ± duyurdu. Tahran yoÌˆnetimi, IÌ‡srail'e karsÌ§Ä±lÄ±k verecegÌ†ini duyurdu. IÌ‡ran'dan savasÌ§a ilisÌ§kin yapÄ±lan ilk resmi acÌ§Ä±klamada Azizi, "Daha oÌˆnce uyarmÄ±sÌ§tÄ±k, siz basÌ§lattÄ±nÄ±z ama bitisÌ§i sizin elinizde olmayacak" ifadelerini kullandÄ±. HAMANEY, TAHRAN'DA DEGÌ†IÌ‡L Reuters haber ajansÄ±, IÌ‡ran dini lideri Ayetullah Ali Hamaney'in Tahran'da olmadÄ±gÌ†Ä±nÄ± ve guÌˆvenli bir yere goÌˆtuÌˆruÌˆlduÌˆgÌ†uÌˆnuÌˆ aktardÄ±. IÌ‡RAN'DA EGÌ†IÌ‡TIÌ‡M DURDU IÌ‡ran'da, ABD-IÌ‡srail saldÄ±rÄ±larÄ± nedeniyle okullar ikinci duyuruya kadar tatil edildi.

title: Mossad launches Farsi Telegram channel for 'Iranian brothers and sisters'
content: Mossad launched a Farsi-language Telegram channel for Iranians to follow news updates on Saturday morning, following the IDF's surprise attacks on Iran as part of Operation Shield of Judah.In announcing the channel launch, Mossad called out to "Our Iranian brothers and sisters," saying that "you are not alone.""We have launched a super secure and special Telegram channel for you [and] together we will return Iran to its glorious days," Mossad wrote.The intelligence service also called on Iranians to share photos and videos of their "just struggle against the regime."The message concluded by stating that the most important thing is for Iranians to "take care of themselves."Iranian state media reported explosions heard in Tehran, Qom, Isfahan, Kermanshah, and Karaj, while Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei is not in Tehran and has been transferred to a "secure location," an Iranian official confirmed to Reuters.Shir Perets and Reuters contributed to this report.This is a developing story.

title: Iran prepares for retaliation, official vows 'crushing response' to Israel-US attack
content: Tehran is preparing for a retaliation attack, Iranian officials said on Saturday, vowing to carry out a "crushing response" to the Israel-US combined attack on Iran this Saturday."Tehran is preparing for retaliation; the response will be crushing," the officials said, according toÂ Reuters.Defense officials assess high chance of Iranian missile response within hoursDefense establishment sources assessed that the likelihood of an Iranian response within hours, including missile launches, is increasing.Sources told Walla that one of the objectives of the strikes was to remove threats to Israel's home front, with an emphasis on missile launchers and bases used to operate unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs).The report said the strikes were expanding to additional locations in Iran, including Qom, Isfahan, Kermanshah, and Karaj.The IDF continued to surge forces to bases and staff command headquarters. He added that Central Command was reinforced with five companies and that the military raised alert levels along Israel's borders over concerns about attempted attacks.There was also unusually heavy helicopter traffic over Israel as the IDF moved forces between arenas.Amir Bohbot contributed to this report.

title: Estados Unidos e Israel lancÌ§am ataque coordenado contra o IraÌƒ
content: Os Estados Unidos e Israel lancÌ§aram um ataque coordenado contra o IraÌƒ hoje. O presidente dos EUA disse que o objetivo do ataque era defender o povo americano. JaÌ o ministro da Defesa de Israel, Israel Katz, declarou estado de emergeÌ‚ncia em todo o territoÌrio nacional. O que aconteceu O anuÌncio do ministro israelense foi feito enquanto uma densa fumacÌ§a subia de uma explosaÌƒo no centro de TeeraÌƒ, capital do IraÌƒ. "Israel lancÌ§ou um ataque preventivo contra o IraÌƒ para eliminar as ameacÌ§as ao Estado israelense", disse o Ministro da Defesa, Israel Katz. Ao mesmo tempo, sirenes soaram em Israel. Os militares israelenses disseram que o alerta era "preventivo, para preparar o puÌblico para a possibilidade de lancÌ§amento de miÌsseis contra o Estado de Israel". As ForcÌ§as Armadas de Israel anunciaram o fechamento de escolas e locais de trabalho, com excecÌ§aÌƒo de setores essenciais. Israel fechou seu espacÌ§o aeÌreo para voos civis, e a autoridade aeroportuaÌria pediu ao puÌblico que naÌƒo se dirigisse a nenhum dos aeroportos do paiÌs. O presidente Donald Trump se manifestou sobre a acÌ§aÌƒo apoÌs o anuÌncio do ministro israelense. "HaÌ pouco, os militares dos Estados Unidos iniciaram grandes operacÌ§oÌƒes de combate no IraÌƒ. O nosso objetivo eÌ defender o povo americano eliminando ameacÌ§as do regime iraniano", disse em viÌdeo publicado em sua rede social. Trump reconheceu que poderia haver baixas americanas em caso de retaliacÌ§aÌƒo do IraÌƒ. O presidente americano disse que "isso acontece frequentemente em guerras". Trump afirmou que pretende destruir o arsenal de miÌsseis do IraÌƒ e garantir que o paiÌs naÌƒo obtenha uma arma nuclear. O governo Donald Trump reuniu uma vasta frota de cacÌ§as e navios de guerra em meia aÌ€s negociacÌ§oÌƒes sobre o programa nuclear do IraÌƒ. Apesar das conversas, o presidente americano declarou ontem estar decepcionado com o andamento das tratativas e afirmou que "aÌ€s vezes eÌ preciso usar a forcÌ§a". O ataque teria ocorrido perto dos escritoÌrios do LiÌder Supremo do IraÌƒ, o aiatolaÌ Ali Khamenei. Ele naÌƒo estava em TeeraÌƒ, pois havia sido transferido para um local seguro, informou uma fonte aÌ€ ageÌ‚ncia Reuters. A imprensa estatal do IraÌƒ informou que o presidente Masoud Pezeshkian estaÌ em segurancÌ§a. ExplosoÌƒes tambeÌm foram ouvidas em outras regioÌƒes do IraÌƒ, que estava se preparando para retaliar o ataque. title: Shah-Sohn geht von baldigem "endguÌˆltigen Sieg" uÌˆber islamische FuÌˆhrung im Iran aus
content: Angesichts der Angriffe Israels und der USA auf den Iran geht der Sohn des letzten iranischen Schahs, Reza Pahlavi, von einem baldigen Ende der Islamischen Republik aus. "Wir sind nahe an einem endguÌˆltigen Sieg", sagte Pahlavi, der in den USA im Exil lebt, am Samstag in einer im Internet veroÌˆffentlichten Video-Botschaft."Ich moÌˆchte so bald wie moÌˆglich an Eurer Seite sein, damit wir zusammen uns den Iran zuruÌˆckholen und wiederaufbauen koÌˆnnen", fuÌˆgte der Schah-Sohn hinzu. Vorerst solle die iranische BevoÌˆlkerung aber nicht auf die StraÃŸe gehen. "Ich rufe Euch auf, in Euren HaÌˆusern zu bleiben und Eure Sicherheit zu schuÌˆtzen", sagte Pahlavi in seiner Ansprache. "Bleibt wachsam und bereit, so dass Ihr zur gegebenen Zeit, die ich Euch genau mitteilen werde, fuÌˆr die endguÌˆltige Aktion wieder auf die StraÃŸe gehen koÌˆnnt."Zuvor hatten am Samstagmorgen Israel und die USA nach eigenen Angaben Luftangriffe gegen den Iran gestartet. Aus Teheran und mehreren anderen StaÌˆdten des Landes wurden Explosionen gemeldet. US-PraÌˆsident Donald Trump sagte, Ziel sei es, die "unmittelbare Bedrohungen durch das iranische Regime" auszuschalten. Die iranische Raketenindustrie solle "dem Erdboden" gleichgemacht und die Marine vernichtet werden. Zugleich rief Trump alle iranischen Soldaten und SicherheitskraÌˆfte auf, sich zu ergeben. Die BevoÌˆlkerung des Landes rief er in einer Ansprache auf, die Regierung in Teheran im Anschluss an den Einsatz zu stuÌˆrzen.Die Spannungen zwischen Israel und den USA mit dem Iran hatten in den vergangenen Wochen und vor allem seit der blutigen Niederschlagung der regierungskritischen Proteste im Iran im Januar deutlich zugenommen. Bei den damaligen Protesten hatten einige Demonstrierende auch eine RuÌˆckkehr zur Monarchie gefordert. Pahlavi hat sich fuÌˆr eine saÌˆkulare Demokratie im Iran ausgesprochen. In juÌˆngster Zeit hatte er US-PraÌˆsident Trump wiederholt aufgefordert, im Iran einzuschreiten. Die iranische Opposition ist gespalten, Teile davon kritisieren Pahlavi wegen seiner UnterstuÌˆtzung fuÌˆr Israel. Zudem distanzierte er sich nie von der autokratischen Herrschaft seines Vaters.
