content: BRUSEL - SÌŒeÌfka diplomacie EUÌ Kaja KallasovaÌ vyzvala Afganistan a Pakistan na okamzÌŒiteÌ zniÌzÌŒenie napaÌˆtia a zastavenie nepriatelÌŒskyÌch akciiÌ. Vo vyhlaÌseniÌ zverejnenom v noci na sobotu tiezÌŒ upozornila na mozÌŒneÌ doÌ‚sledky pre celyÌ regioÌn. Informuje o tom spraÌva agentuÌry DPA. Pakistan piatok bombardoval afganskeÌ mestaÌ KaÌbul a KandahaÌr v odvete za uÌtok afganskyÌch siÌl na pakistanskeÌ pohranicÌŒneÌ jednotky. PodlÌŒa afganskeÌho hnutia Taliban isÌŒlo o reakciu za predchaÌdzajuÌce naÌlety Islamabadu. UÌtokom vo viaceryÌch oblastiach pozdlÌzÌŒ hraniÌc predchaÌdzali pohranicÌŒneÌ zraÌzÌŒky a uÌdery Pakistanu na Afganistan v uplynulyÌch mesiacoch. Obe armaÌdy uviedli, zÌŒe pri naÌsilnostiach zahynuli uzÌŒ desiatky vojakov. KallasovaÌ podlÌŒa vyhlaÌsenia vyzvala obe strany konfliktu na naÌvrat k dialoÌgu. ZdoÌ‚raznila zaÌrovenÌŒ, zÌŒe uÌzemie Afganistanu nesmie bytÌŒ vyuzÌŒiÌvaneÌ na uÌtoky na ineÌ krajiny, a apelovala na tamojsÌŒiu vlaÌdu, aby podnikla opatrenia proti vsÌŒetkyÌm teroristickyÌm skupinaÌm v krajine alebo z nej. CezhranicÌŒnaÌ palÌŒba podlÌŒa agentuÌry Reuters pokracÌŒovala aj v sobotu. PakistanskeÌ sily uviedli, zÌŒe pokracÌŒujuÌ v operaÌcii a zÌŒe znicÌŒili viacero stanoviÌsÌŒtÌŒ a taÌborov Talibanu v niekolÌŒkyÌch sektoroch. Reuters tieto tvrdenia nedokaÌzala nezaÌvisle overitÌŒ. Islamabad obvinÌŒuje KaÌbul, zÌŒe poskytuje uÌtocÌŒisko pakistanskeÌmu Talibanu, ktoryÌ sa liÌsÌŒi od afganskeÌho hnutia, a uÌdajne mu pomaÌha pri cezhranicÌŒnyÌch uÌtokoch namierenyÌch proti pakistanskyÌm bezpecÌŒnostnyÌm silaÌm. Afganistan tieto tvrdenia popiera. ZdielÌŒatÌŒ Tip na cÌŒlaÌnok

title: Coupe dâ€™Afrik des cuisines: la troisieÌ€me eÌdition lanceÌe aÌ€ Paris
content: La Fondatrice de la Coupe dâ€™Afrik des cuisines, Sandrine Nzinda Kissina, a choisi de donner, le 27 feÌvrier, le coup dâ€™envoi de la troisieÌ€me eÌdition aÌ€ partir de la salle verte de lâ€™ambassade de la ReÌpublique du Congo aÌ€ Paris. Le rendez-vous culinaire sâ€™est tenu En preÌsence du ministre conseiller, Armand ReÌmy Balloud-TabaweÌ; de lâ€™ambassadeur de la gastronomie, parrain de la troisieÌ€me eÌdition du concours de la Coupe dâ€™Afrik des cuisines, Guillaume Gomez ; des diplomates, des partenaires ; des futurs chefs, personnaliteÌs de la gastronomie, journalistes et autres inviteÌs. Pour les organisateurs, cet eÌveÌnement est lâ€™aboutissement dâ€™une vision partageÌe, avec une foi profonde dans leur projet symbolisant une volonteÌ affirmeÌe par lâ€™uniteÌ, la transmission et la ceÌleÌbration des talents culinaires. Ils estiment que par cette tribune, bien quâ€™il sâ€™agisse de mettre en lumieÌ€re la gastronomie, câ€™est eÌgalement la ceÌleÌbration de lâ€™excellence, de lâ€™engagement et de la fierteÌ des cultures. En somme, câ€™est un acceÌleÌrateur de talents, un espace de transmission. Â« Câ€™est une ceÌleÌbration de notre patrimoine culinaire et de son avenir Â», a confieÌ Sandrine Nzinda Kissina, deÌsireuse de faire comprendre combien câ€™est un outil puissant, aÌ€ la fois culturel, eÌconomique et diplomatique. En tant que fin diplomate de la gastronomie en geÌneÌral, et particulieÌ€rement de celle de lâ€™Afrique ouÌ€ il est preÌsent par la gestion de deux eÌcoles de cuisine dans deux pays africains, l'ancien chef cuisinier de l'ElyseÌe, Guillaume Gomez, a tenu aÌ€ venir soutenir cette initiative entre deux activiteÌs au Salon de lâ€™agriculture de Paris. Sâ€™adressant aÌ€ lâ€™assistance, au nom de lâ€™ambassadeur Rodolphe Adada, le ministre conseiller a rappeleÌ combien il eÌtait heureux dâ€™accueillir cet eÌveÌnement qui ceÌleÌ€bre la richesse et la diversiteÌ des cuisines africaines, moment de convivialiteÌ, mais aussi moment dâ€™un teÌmoignage de lâ€™uniteÌ et de la passion commune de la gastronomie. Â« Au-delaÌ€ des mets, la gastronomie est un langage universel qui rapproche les peuples. La cuisine constitue un pont qui facilite les eÌchanges entre nos pays Â», a confieÌ Armand ReÌmy Balloud- TabaweÌ, avant de convier les inviteÌs aÌ€ eÌchanger autour des mets, les deÌcouvrir et ceÌleÌbrer la diversiteÌ culinaire au point de faire de la troisieÌ€me eÌdition de la Coupe dâ€™Afrik des cuisines un moment inoubliable. La Coupe dâ€™Afrik des cuisines est ouverte aux chefs confirmeÌs, aux amateurs...

title: Worker fired for embezzling â‚¬900,000 wants severance, claiming gambling addiction
content: A man who got fired from his job as a financial manager at a Rotterdam maritime company after being caught embezzling nearly a million euros from his employer has asked the court to award him severance pay. The man argued that, as a gambling addict, he couldnâ€™t be held liable for his actions, and his employer should have taken better care of him. In 2022, a subdistrict court already ruled against the man. The appeals court in The Hague now did the same, according to a ruling published this week. The man started working as a financial manager at the maritime company Hydromaster in 2019. During his time there, he secretly transferred money from Hydromaster and affiliate companies to personal bank accounts and accounts belonging to his own companies. By the time his employer discovered this in 2022 after a tip from the bank, the man had already embezzled nearly 800,000 euros. He withdrew another 89,000 euros from the company credit card. Hydromaster dismissed the man and took him to court, demanding the full amount of the embezzlement back, plus 18,000 euros to cover the costs of the internal investigation into his conduct, and a fixed compensation of 6,000 euros. The man, in turn, demanded his remaining salary, holiday pay, and a severance package. He disputed that he embezzled Hydromasterâ€™s funds and used the companyâ€™s credit cards for his own purposes, suggesting that somebody else could have performed the transactions. He also argued that he cannot be held responsible because â€œhis actions were predominantly governed by his disorders.â€ According to the ruling, these included a severe gambling addiction, cluster headaches, hypersensitivity, and autism. And he argued that Hydromaster failed as an employer by not noticing his problems. The appeals court ruled against the man, saying that there was ample evidence that he was behind the embezzlement. The court does not dispute that the man has been diagnosed with a gambling addiction, autism spectrum disorder, and cluster headaches, but the medical documents submitted donâ€™t indicate that these disorders left him with no choice but to embezzle money from his employer. â€œThis may explain why he acted as he did, but that does not mean he did not actually intend to transfer the money to himself, nor does it mean he cannot be held liable for this,â€ the court said. The court ordered the man to pay the damages claimed by Hydromaster, as well as over 18,000 euros in court costs.

title: Four die, nine injured in Anambra multiple road crash
content: Tragedy struck at the Agulu Lake, Nanka-Agulu road axis of the Awkaâ€“Ekwulobia Road in Anaocha LGA of Anambra State, when no fewer than four women were killed and nine persons sustained varying degrees of injuries in a road crash involving multiple vehicles on Friday night. Eyewitnesses near the scene said the victims were returning from a burial ceremony when the driver of the vehicle conveying them lost control while descending towards the narrow bridge and plunged into the crash. Although the eyewitnesses could not confirm the exact number of casualties, the Federal Road Safety Corps put the casualty number at four. One of the eyewitnesses said, â€œThe driver of the vehicle was descending the road when the vehicle failed brakes and he lost control, thereby plunging into the crash, killing some people, mostly women, instantly and injuring others. â€œThe accident occurred at about 7pm on Friday. From their attire, the victims were returning from a burial ceremony. Some of the community members did a first emergency response before the arrival of officials at the scene. â€œThe road is very narrow and the absence of an alternative bridge that would allow vehicles ascending and descending the hilly stretch to use separate lanes is always causing traffic crashes along that corridor.â€ When contacted on the development, the Sector Public Education Officer, FRSC, Anambra State Command, Margaret Onabe, confirmed the crash in a press statement on Saturday. Onabe said the crash involved four vehicles â€“ Toyota Hiace, Registration Number: HAL676YG; Trailer, Registration Number: N/A; Shuttle, with Registration Number: UKP274YA; and a Toyota Hellux, Registration Number: N/A. According to her, the crash occurred at 18:18 hours on Friday, killing four persons and injuring nine others. The statement read, â€œA fatal road traffic crash occurred on, 27th February 2026, at Agulu Lake, Nanka-Agulu road. The probable cause was speed and loss of control. Related News Police detain four, recover vehicles stolen in Enugu, Anambra Anambra demolishes shrine as native doctor jailed 11 months Lent: FRSC, firm distribute food to vulnerable residents in Anambra â€œThere were no eyewitnesses to the crash, as all the drivers fled the scene. â€œHowever, according to observations by the FRSC rescue team from Nanka outpost, it was noted that the vehicle was descending the hill at a high speed, lost control, and collided with three other vehicles. â€œThe total number of people involved was 19, comprising...

title: Israel beginnt erneut Krieg gegen den Iran
content: Bereits im vergangenen Jahr hatten Washington und Teheran uÌˆber Irans umstrittenes Atomprogramm verhandelt, ehe Israel den Iran angriff. Die USA schlossen sich den Luftangriffen an und bombardierten zentrale Atomanlagen. Irans LuftstreitkraÌˆfte feuerten daraufhin ballistische Raketen auf Israel. Katz teilte nun mit, er habe einen sofortigen Ausnahmezustand im gesamten Land ausgerufen. In ganz Israel heulten die Sirenen. In der iranischen Hauptstadt Teheran gab es Explosionen in der Stadtmitte. Israel hatte bereits im vergangenen Jahr Krieg gegen den Iran gefuÌˆhrt. Der neue Angriff erfolgt nur zwei Tage nach einer weiteren Verhandlungsrunde zwischen den USA und dem Iran uÌˆber das umstrittene Atomprogramm der Islamischen Republik. Einen Durchbruch hatte es bei den GespraÌˆchen in Genf nicht gegeben. US-PraÌˆsident Donald Trump hatte der iranischen FuÌˆhrung in den vergangenen Wochen wiederholt mit militaÌˆrischen Angriffen gedroht â€“ auch vor dem Hintergrund des brutalen Vorgehens des iranischen Sicherheitsapparats gegen die Proteste zu Jahresbeginn. Trump stellte dem Iran kuÌˆrzlich ein Ultimatum bis Anfang MaÌˆrz. Â«Entweder wir erzielen eine Einigung oder es wird fuÌˆr sie bedauerlichÂ». Die USA wollen verhindern, dass die FuÌˆhrung in Teheran in den Besitz von Atomwaffen gelangt. Irans Regierung zeigte sich zuletzt bereit, ihr Nuklearprogramm zu begrenzen, fordert im Gegenzug jedoch die Aufhebung harter Wirtschaftssanktionen. Die USA sind wichtigster VerbuÌˆndeter Israels. Irans StaatsfuÌˆhrung betonte zuletzt ihre Bereitschaft zu einem Abkommen wie auch zu einer militaÌˆrischen Eskalation. PraÌˆsident Massud Peseschkian drohte mit einem Â«umfassenden KriegÂ», sollte etwa ReligionsfuÌˆhrer Ajatollah Ali Chamenei attackiert werden. Chamenei selbst warnte die USA Anfang Februar: Â«Die Amerikaner sollen wissen, wenn sie einen Krieg vom Zaun brechen, wird es dieses Mal ein regionaler Krieg sein.Â» Der Iran wolle keinen Krieg und werde ihn auch nicht beginnen, sagte der ReligionsfuÌˆhrer, der in allen strategischen Belangen das letzte Wort in Teheran hat.
